name: Self Tan Express Bronzing Mousse
about: What it is:.What it is formulated to do:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: -100 Percent Natural DHA: Tanning agent....Water, Dihydroxyacetone, Caramel, Propylene Glycol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Decyl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Melanin, Fragrance, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Sodium Metabisulfite, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, CI 14700 (Red 4), CI 19140 (Yellow 5), CI 42090 (Blue 1).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Exfoliate 24 hours prior to use. Immediately prior to application, moisturize any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles, and feet...-For best results, apply using the Tan Applicator Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. For your back, turn the mitt back to front and start applying in the same way. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet. ..-Wait until touch dry before getting dressed. ..-Allow four to eight hours before showering to reveal your developed tan...-To prolong and maintain your tan, moisturize daily, exfoliate regularly, and reapply as desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to disclose that this product was graciously gifted to me by the brand. Being someone who loves a sun-kissed glow but dislikes the fuss of traditional tanning methods, I was intrigued by the No-Transfer Tanning Mousse. And let me tell you, it's a game-changer!  The application couldn't be simpler. The tinted formula guides your hand seamlessly, ensuring a smooth, streak-free finish every time. I opted for the Medium Tan, and the result was a natural-looking radiance that lasted.  What really impressed me was the lightweight feel on my skin. It absorbed quickly, leaving behind no stickiness or residue. Plus, the absence of that dreaded self-tan smell was a major win.  Eight hours later, I was left with a beautifully even tan that didn't look the least bit artificial. And as it gradually faded, it did so evenly, leaving me with a seamless glow.  Overall, the No-Transfer Tanning Mousse has become my go-to for effortless bronzed skin. It's quick, easy, and delivers fantastic results every time. Trust me, your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_text: I hesitate to write this review, because Iu2019m selfish and donu2019t want it to sell out, but here goes ud83dude1b. This mousse is amazing. Iu2019m almost 60 and have tried most every self-tanner, since the late 80u2019s. This one is by far the best, most realistic, and longest lasting self tanner Iu2019ve tried. You get super dark after about four hours, so be sure to wash it off earlier, if you donu2019t want to go that dark. read some comments about how green the mousse appears when itu2019s first dispensed, and theyu2019re right. This greenish hue though is what will keep you from turning orange. I exfoliate first and apply the mousse right after applying some very rich body lotion, so that the color doesnu2019tu2019grabu2019 in places like my knees and ankles. I also apply with the self- tanning mitts, one on each hand. I used to apply self-tanners with regular latex gloves, but the fuzzy texture of the mitts mbkends the mousse so much better into your skin, and helps the tanner go on evenly.

reviews.review_text: This is by far my favourite tan. Itu2019s hard to find one with natural undertones, and this one has done that for me! I also hate wearing tanners for long periods of time, so the express was a game changer. It has great payoff for the short time itu2019s left on, and is super easy to apply (if you know the basics of application). The color usually lasts about 5 days before I notice the fade and also gets a bit blotchy on my chest around then. I think if I was better at using moisturizer regularly that may fix that problem though, so I canu2019t blame the product for that. Overall I really love this product and would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well I just wrote an entire review and lost it due to the Sephora app bugs. Just take my word from a pale Irish girl who has self tanned for 20 years - this is a fantastic product. I use this when I need a same day tan but donu2019t want to worry about getting water spots or sweating. I typically use the non-express version overnight as it can be more forgiving. Just follow the normal self tan recommendations by exfoliating the day before not shaving the day of application and lightly moisturizing hands feet elbows and knees. Also donu2019t worry about leaving it on more than three hours, I have left it on overnight when I want a super dark glow. I usually use this one on u201cfreshu201d skin after the previous tan is removed and will use the gradual tanner or the regular mousse to maintain. You definitely need to use with a mitt (in case you were wondering..) Iu2019ve read the other reviews and I think most of them are user error.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried tons of self tanning lotions. This one is great and here's why: - no tanning smell, this mousse actually smells quite nice during application. It's a soft subtle scent of something spa like mixed with a rich baby lol - this mousse DEVELOPS. Looks quite light upon application because this product doesn't dazzle you with the color guard that washes off in the first shower after application. Cheaper mousse will do that... Not this one. It has 100% DHAs meaning it's potent in the developing process. - it lasts a week if not longer if you care for your self tan (moisturize daily) - the fading period is quite graceful  This mousse isn't for you if: - you don't enjoy being a tad sticky after applying. The stickiness goes away after a bit but it is a little sticky, not excessive though. - cool tone people may not enjoy the this product as it could make them look a little orange. It's good for neutral and warm skin tones as I feel this tanner leans a bit on the warm tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews but I feel I have to for this product! This is the smoothest self tanner I have ever used. Itu2019s so easy to apply, itu2019s easy to tell where you applied, and waiting only the few hours instead of sleeping in it (and ruining my sheets) is way easier for me. If you want to get even darker, wait for it to get fairly dry and do a second coat. I do my body and then another coat on my stomach at the end. I just exfoliate the day before and make sure Iu2019m completely dry when I apply. I donu2019t necessarily apply right after the shower either - sometimes in the middle of the day, as long as I exfoliated before. The color develops really nicely and looks like I got a professional spray tan.

reviews.review_title: A little too orange for my taste
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was easy to apply, and I got mostly even coverage, although it was a little more orange than I would like. Granted, I have a naturally cool skin tone, so it might look less weird on someone with a warmer skin tone, but still could be better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was not mouse-y at all - leaked everywhere and was very watery. I returned and got a new one and the new one ended up being the same.  Gross

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Get tons of complements on my tan. Gives such a great a color on me without looking orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg there is no way I paid 55$ for this mousse!?!? It's so patchy and hard to spread on the skin :(. I wasn't even a little darker after 3hrs! It took my skin almost a day to become a tad darker! The next day I just robbed my arm with my hand and it all came off... I never experienced something like that with my regular tanning mousse. Won't buy again. But if you like olive tone and can manage to rub it on the skin it's for you! Everbody seems to love it! I really wanted to love it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Gives me a beautiful tan that lasts a couple days. My only complaint would be that it sticks to dry spots but honestly that happens with any tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall the product itself is fantastic, glowy within an hour, tanned within 2 and full potential by the next day. Only reason I donu2019t rate it 5 stars is the smell :( sadly itu2019s a noticeable tanner smell & only thing that helps is showering (which you canu2019t do for the first 8 hours or so!) Although I STILL  buy this tanner over any other one regardless of the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The holy grail. Iu2019ve repurchased this over and over again throughout the years. Only other tanner that I will use is the st. tropez x ashley graham collab that has a more luxurious feel to it, and develops darker. Unfortunately the Ashley graham version is a limited edition so Iu2019m sure Iu2019ll be back to my old faithful express tan soon! This also dries down a lot quicker than the limited edition so yeah, just amazing. Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m disappointed. I used to love this brand and have been tanning with them for years. This express tan does not get as dark as Iu2019d like it to but is great for a quick tan. Works best if you leave it on for 5+ hours unless you want a very sheer flow. However usually a large bottle of mouse lasts 3 months+ of tanning for 1-2 times a week. This I only got 3 applications out of. Not sure if my bottle was defective or if they changed something in the last year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointing. Turned orange. I have light to medium skin tone, left the product on for four hours. Now I look orange and it does have a tan smell. I used to love at tropez products, but now would never buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well. The whole line is complete trash. Iu2019ve used more drug store self tanners that work and arenu2019t sticky like this. This brand is sticky, stinky, doesnu2019t stay for more than 2 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was not bad, but for some reason came out too orange and blotchy. I showered off the tanner like it says you are suppose to, which typically evens out the tan but for some reason it was still super orange. Maybe I will still with the regular St. Tropez or the vita liberata, I liked that one alot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great color but a little sticky while it tans your skin. I prefer the classic over this one. Either one, the longer you let it sit, the darker you will be. Doesnu2019t stain clothes or sheets. I dry myself with the hair dryer and use a good amount of product to give a sun missed glow. Very mild self tanning odor compared to most products. This is perfect for at home or on the go. Or even to bring on vacation to touch up your spray tan. The face tan never last since your wash your face twice a day. Just see the difference between my legs and arm. Applied twice and sat overnight. Will last a few days then reapply. Totally worth the price. Get the mitt to give a nice application. Donu2019t get freaked out if itu2019s a little green being applied , the next day it will give you a nice glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great tan that develops quickly. The u201cfake tanu201d scent is present (itu2019s basically unavoidable) but not too strong, especially after the first rinse. It lasts well, layers well, and fades well.

reviews.review_title: Great application -- but maybe not strong enough?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this tanner. The best thing about it is that it doesn't streak, and the smell, while a little chemical, isn't too intense. Giving it four stars only because I have a very pale skin tone, and even after leaving this on for 8 hours (as opposed to the max recommended 3) I am not visibly tan at the first application. It's more of a nice glow. I have to apply again the next day in order to build the tan up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually prefer this that and the original because itu2019s faster and gives the same results. Just make sure to moisturize so you donu2019t get orange dry spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Once a sun worshiper, I have avoided exposure for about 15 years. My legs, particularly, are so white (and not the even porcelain I could live with). This is amazing. I can go about 1/2 the time (90 minutes) and get a solid glow that makes my legs even and similar to my arms. This gives a bit my bronze undertone than my natural red so it's not an exact match to my arms, but no one would ever notice. And for me, this doesn't rub off after the application is washed away. Love it!

reviews.review_title: All I can say is WOW
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying this. This formula applied easily and smoothly with the mitt I purchased and left my skin with a flawless natural looking tan! There was no streaking or patchiness. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for an at home self tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. I use this product all the time now. Could not recommend more. The tan looks fantastic and natural and it fades perfectly without flaking. Will never get a spray tan again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: amazing !!!!! I am super super pale and got this product after using other tanning products. It is easy to apply with a glove and has a bit of color so you can make sure you donu2019t miss any spots. After an hour I showered it off and woke up with the most natural looking non streaky tan! Hoping itu2019ll last a good amount of time! Highly recommended !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ho. Ly. Grail! I am an extremely fair (okay, fish-belly white) woman in my 40u2019s. I donu2019t tan, I burn, then freckle. I have been using Fake Bake 60 minute for many years, and when I couldnu2019t find it anywhere, I gave St. Tropez Express a go. Itu2019s amazing! No funky smell. And no more looking like The Hulk (Green) for 8-12 hours. A nice golden tan, during while processing and after rinsing. Easy to apply, no streaking, no orange color. And it didnu2019t even rub off or discolor under my air cast on my sprained ankle! Worth every penny! I even used a bit on my face, which I never dared to do with any other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My fav tanning product by far!!!  It spreads evenly and creates a beautiful natural color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail. Love that you can choose how dark you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The classics are a classic for a reason - this is my holy grail self-tanner. If you use a mitt, itu2019s pretty impossible to mess it up. I leave on for 4 hours, which I love because I can apply after work and still rinse off before bed. Tone is perfect - not orange at all. I get compliments on my tan whenever I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely pale skin and this product has saved me on so many occasions!  This self-tan is the best self-tan product I've used yet.  Definitely get the mitt as this makes it so much easier to apply on and you don't have to worry about getting tanner on your hands.  I try and do it 4 days before I have an event and then again 2 days before and it works every time!  Definitely recommend this self-tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used Saint Tropez products for many years now, and this product feels antiquated. I donu2019t appreciate how it makes your skin feel sticky, even if itu2019s just on for a few hours you have to make sure that you donu2019t touch anything for fear of streaking or rubbing off on clothes. Personally, express to me is translated as convenient and I would prefer formula that dried faster and didnu2019t streak if you did decide to wear it overnight in bed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this at the beginning of a trip to Hawaii and Iu2019m so glad I did! I barely get any color on my own so I thought the gradual development of one while on vacation would seem way more plausible than arriving already tan.  Thereu2019s a very subtle color that shows up during application, making it a lot easier to know youu2019re applying everywhere and arenu2019t missing any spots. It didnu2019t absorb heavily on my knees and elbows which was great, and the color ended up looking incredibly natural. I didnu2019t look orange at all. This works wonderfully and Iu2019ve tried them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like a lot of the other reviews said this product really doesnu2019t get that dark. The advertising regarding this being an express tan is also really misleading because you leave it on for 1-3 hours, rinse with water then the tan develops over the next 8+ hoursu2026so itu2019s not really u201cexpress.u201d However this product pairs really well over a natural tan and doesnu2019t turn you orange!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s fine for a mild bronze but you will not get a dark tan, at least not if you follow the instructions and leave it on for 3 hours like I did. I noticed a slight bronze but nothing like what youu2019d expect from a u201cdarku201d tan. Seems like you need to leave it on longer than 3 hours which kind of defeats the purpose of it being an express tanner. Has a bit of an orangey tint so Iu2019d be concerned leaving it on longer would just make you full on orange. Likely wonu2019t be using again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour and easy application of this bronzing mousse, and the best part is that it doesn't streak!! That being said, it doesn't last long and almost completely washes off after one shower. It's a lot of work for 2 days of a tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really fast. Can get on clothes if not rinsed off properly. Iu2019ve used other self tanners this one is extremely effective. If you wear it too long it will turn more orange. But regardless I like it ans can look really natural if donu2019t right. Use scented lotion after itu2019s rinsed off to eliminate that fake tan smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great!  I'll never go back to the 6+ hr lotion.  I am guessing all of the people that are saying it didnt color them or it washed off did not apply/ treat it correctly. I applied it with gloves - I think the mitts soak it up and waste product/ doesnt apply as smoothly. When you rinse it off, you just rinse it off - no soap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really easy to apply, beautiful olive tan, no orange or weird streaks, fades nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: About this bronzing mouse didnu2019t give any color sucks donu2019t wast your money not worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT! Iu2019m super pale so I was a little bit worried that it would look orange but it didnu2019t. Nice healthy glow, you wonu2019t regret it!

reviews.review_title: I can definitely see why itu2019s a favorite!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m giving 4 but would give 4.5/5  Initial: smell is clean, almost like that linen scent from bath and body works. Fragrant but not overwhelming. I never noticed a self tan smell but that could be because I only did test strips. I used a small kabuki to apply the test strips.  I included pictures of first the initial application, and then afterwards. The results are two pictures because one is right after I washed off the 3 hour strip and the second is 12 hours after wash off. I tried to label the pictures so I hope it makes sense. You can definitely notice a color after you wash it off even after the first hour but it got much darker the next day (I did this in the evening). I knocked off half a star because the difference between the 1, 2, and 3 hour test strips are minimal. This could be due to dispersement of product and it being on the palest part of my arm. The difference between 1 and 2 is almost non existent and 3 is only slightly darker. However Iu2019m pretty impressed with how dark the color turned out since it wasnu2019t on that long at all. Having that kind of color after only an hour is pretty impressive. However I still have yet to use this on my entire body and I will update if needed.  Overall Iu2019m pretty happy with it. The Ashley Graham collaboration is still my favorite in terms of color but this one is a close second because I hate having to leave self tanners on for hours because itu2019s just uncomfortable for me. If they made the Ashley Graham one an express I could die happy lol!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly this is the best bronzing mousse EVER. It leaves a beautiful golden colour. Secondly youu2019re SUPPOSED to wash it after 6 hours,  so that then excess leaves otherwise it will come off in your sheets or clothes. Once the extra is gone youu2019re left with a lovely tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i read so many reviews that mention how the tan u201cwashes away in the showeru201d and u201cdoesnu2019t show up.u201d after you go to get a professional airbrush tan, you shower and see color come out in the shower. this is normal. you donu2019t notice an immediate difference. it takes eight hours for this tan, like a professional airbrush tan, to fully develop. be patient to see results! the term u201cexpressu201d is misleading. iu2019m giving four stars because it was a tendency to pill slightly upon application. otherwise, itu2019s an excellent product and worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I remember using this years ago and it worked beautifully but I just got it recently to try again and NO change in color. It wipes on so lightly (in the past it used to go on dark) and never seen it develop over the 3 hours I waited.  I am very light...VERY. And this did not change my color at all.   I am disappointed because I loved it years ago...I hope they didnu2019t change their recipe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best self tanner on the market. No streaks, no smell, no fake orange color. Long lasting & fast to develop.

Iu2019ve been using this bronzer mousse for years now and I love it. Itu2019s so natural and it fades beautifully. A lot of people will leave it on all night, which Iu2019ve done, but I prefer to only keep it on for 3 hours. The reason is when you sleep you often sweat which can result in patches. If I just keep it on for 3 hours I can watch it while it develops and add tanner on if Iu2019ve missed anything. Love this product and Iu2019ll never switch to anything else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I also use Bondi Sands but I think I like this more. Itu2019s not as sticky and doesnu2019t transfer like BS. I get pretty dark after applying two layers. I also leave this on all night!!! I think thatu2019s the trick to getting it dark. It does fade some after first wash.  I used to spray tan and this is better IMO. I canu2019t control it , the spray booth would sometimes miss the back of my legs. I am very pale with freckles and burn in the sun. Wear your sunscreen!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This self tanner turns my skin a beautiful golden color, and I really like that you can adjust the intensity by adjusting how long you let it sit on your skin. I donu2019t get out in the sun most days and as a consequence am pretty pale, so I let the product sit on my skin for about 1.5 hours for a nice, natural look. In the summer, or when itu2019s otherwise believable that I might actually have a tan, I keep it on for up to two hours, but my skin would definitely start to look unnatural if I left it on any longer than that. I bounce back and forth between St. Tropez and Loving Tan, and this one is definitely easier and faster to apply. I do think that Loving Tan, with its redder undertones, may be a more natural look, but this one makes me feel more like a golden goddess, and I just keep it a little lighter to prevent any potential over-bronzing. The St. Tropez color also fades really nicely; with good maintenance, the color does last for about a week, and it fades without any streaks or splotchiness. The biggest downside to the St. Tropez mousse is that it gives my skin a faint-to-noticeable burning smell until I shower with soap. Because of this, I try to plan my schedule so that I can apply the tanner the day before an event, let the color develop overnight post-rinse, and then fully shower the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very fair skinned and have been using self tanners since the Coppertone days! This is, without a doubt, one of my favorites. The main reason I initially chose it was because I canu2019t stand sleeping with self tanner on!! I hate the feel (and smell) of self tanner in general. This applies beautifully with a mitt, I leave it on after work for 2 ish hours (I donu2019t like to be too dark!), then rinse off in the shower BEFORE bed. The smell is not bad, no streaking, no orange, and the color lasts several days. Honestly, this is a good one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay self tanner but leaves a very strong DHA smell after it is developed. Products in the same price range like Loving Tan have way less of a smell so this one is not worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the classic for about a year now. I bought this because i heard the tone was different. Its more natural. The color guard looks more olive. It isnt any more dark. I still left it on over night like i do with the classic. Im not sure if its worth the price since the bottle is smaller than the classic but it is really pretty. The smell and fade are identical to the classic in my opinion. I havent tried wearing it for three hrs just because i prefer to sleep with my tanner on. That may change how the tan turns out and wears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I read the other reviews of this product after I returned it and I am not sure how people got no color. I exfoliated/moisturized prior and followed directions. After the time I rinsed off in shower (I donu2019t think I used soap). I liked the tan at first but it just kept getting more orange as the hours went on (like it wouldnu2019t stop developing). It was so bad, that when I walked down the street I could tell people were looking/ making remarks. Iu2019m glad I got my money back. Maybe the original is better? I was looking for a better version than isle of paradise but this was 1000x worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't waste your money. After I waited 4 hours I had absolutely no color what so ever. I usually use Loving Tan, but was wanting to switch it up. DONT. This is garbage. My skin tone is a light beige/olive, for it to give me 0 color makes me think it was defective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I suggest watching an instructional video before using any self Tanner product and for sure get the mitt so to ensure even streak free coverage.  Itu2019s great that you only have to leave this one one for 1-3 hours!  Color definitely comes out more the second day, so I would wait and see before adding another layer, it does layer nicely though if you do decide to apply to go darker.  Do not wear longer than the recommended time though, you wonu2019t get the same natural results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best tans on the market. Gives a deep olive tint and never appears orange. Perfect to sleep overnight in. 4 stars because it is one of the pricier fake tan options.

reviews.review_title: I LOOK LIKE AN UMPA LUMPA
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I look like an Umpa Lumpa, itu2019s so bad the different pics with the shade range isnu2019t real. Donu2019t buy it Iu2019m so orange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried using this 5+ times now and every time I literally see no difference in the color of my skin.  I leave it on for the max three hours, I am pretty fair naturally, and I feel like my skin looks exactly the same when I rinse it off with just warm water and no soap in the shower.  Iu2019m so disappointed.  My skin doesnu2019t even reach the u201chour 1u201d color on the fair model in the photos.

reviews.review_title: Impossible to build color and does not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product, but I am left disappointed. I have tried leaving this on for one, two three, even 12+ hours overnight before quickly rinsing off. Only when I leave it on overnight do I see even the slightest difference to my very fair skin. By the next time I shower, it completely goes away. Do not recommend using on the face either unless you have perfect skin, as it clings to imperfections making a dark spot unlike any tanner I have used before. Will not repurchase considering much cheaper brands outperform this by a landslide. Confused by all the positive reviews.

reviews.review_title: St tropezu2019s bronzing gel over this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used st tropez and many other self tanners for years, and this one does pay off in terms of colour and only needing to have it on for 3 hours, but those 3 hours are miserable. Itu2019s so sticky and stains clothes and even my shower curtain super easily. The same lineu2019s bronzing gel is a way more comfortable formula and has the same results in terms of beautiful colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: My go-to tanning product (itu2019s kind of hard for me to compare, since Iu2019ve never used another tanning product though)!! I love it so much and it gives you such a healthy, natural glow when you use it with a mitt!! Make sure you donu2019t miss any spots though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go too sunless tan for everyday!   Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to for the last 7 years of self tanning. Olive undertones make product more brown instead of orange

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this self tanner! It gives the perfect complexion of brown, as it has a green undertone and not an orange undertone. Itu2019s comparable to a real tan, and prevents sub damage. I prefer this one (instant) as it gives you the same tan, in a shorter amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally love the St. Tropez products, but this one is trash. It is so incredibly streaky no matter how perfectly you rub it in. I use the St. Tropez mitt, and never have had an issue with streakiness with other self tanners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used St. Tropez for years! I normally buy the original mousse, and decided to give this a try! I used the new mitt (which I am obsessed with) and although applying it was amazing, after waiting 4 hours there was no colour payoff. I really wanted this work, as it dried very quickly which was why I gave it a 2 out of 5 stars. Overall, I will be returning this and purchasing the original mousse

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand all the hype on this; I have tried it out twice and both times I have an orange tint and itu2019s streaky looking even when applying evenly with the mitt. Waste of money; like all the other cheaper ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product after trying other St Tropez tanners and Iu2019m sooo disappointed. I always shave and exfoliate the day before I tan. I also made sure to moisturize all dry areas such as elbows. Usually my tan comes out flawless but thatu2019s not the case with this tanner. There are so many things wrong with this product. It takes forever to dry. It comes out of the bottle extremely green and even 12 hours later I look like the grinch. Itu2019s also extremely streaky. There are so many better options, donu2019t waste your money on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my go to on short notice ...never fails me and I know what colour to expect. literally have tried them all...this is one I can count on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color it gives my skin, but the smell is not great. Also, the product coming out of the bottle is green so thatu2019s scary at first, but it turns out fine. If you have a night out planned, apply the product the night before so that your skin has time to absorb the product, and so you can take a shower, because, again, the smell is strong and not great! Donu2019t put it on right before going out youu2019ll regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best self tanning product I've used in my entire life.  Im 51 , I was a avid tanning bed tanner for years until I noticed the big , W on my face after each session. (Wrinkles).   I had to stop doing what brought me so much joy, peace. and relaxation immediately unless I wanted to cause more damage. A friend recommended this product.  It doesn't make you look orange and with the mit I had no streaks. Buying from here on out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing beats St. Tropez. I use this and the purity mist for my face and find the mist works best for my hands (to provide even application). This has always worked the best, develops evenly, easy to use and natural looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good for a few days and really easy to apply. Love that you donu2019t have to sleep in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been self-tanning (or, attempting to) since middle school...meaning 20+ years...because I'm naturally fair but prefer not to be. This mousse, paired with St. Tropez's application mitt, is by far the best there is. Or at least from what I've tried!  Up until the pandemic, I was hooked on personal airbrush tans (from a salon) that were truly flawless but costly and inconvenient when in a pinch. I knew that with citywide  closures, come summer I'd have to learn to do it myself.   Well, I should have been using this all along. I cannot recommend it enough. Zero streaks when applied thoroughly with the mitt, great color, easily buildable, seamless to touch up a mistake, dries quickly, and mess free. Sure, it has a faint self-tanner smell -- they all do because of the DHA. But it's honestly a gem of a product and I still can't believe how easy it was to achieve a professional looking tan at home.

reviews.review_title: this is my favorite self tanner out of dozens
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like being able to tweak the shade simply by time. The showering off helps blend everything out. I always moisturize really well after showering off. No orange. No streaks. Iu2019m VERY fair naturally. This is perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a highly recommended product, and was excited to use it as my first time self tanning (Iu2019ve gotten spray tans before and had amazing experiences). I bought the mitt, the express mousse and the tanning sheet masks (not available at Sephora).  I left it on for almost 2 hours and rinsed off. I was left with no lines/creases (I was worried I would  as it was my first time) and a very mild glow over my body. I put on a extra layer on my tan lines and they are no longer there! As for my face, a lesson learned is to blend into your hairline!! I am fairly pale and now I look like I have the wrong shade foundation applied by a kid... my own fault but will definitely know for next time! I took away one star because it did apply more orange than I expected, but Iu2019m still very impressed with the application! I would still recommend this product for people looking for a quick and effortless self tanner!

reviews.review_title: I love this product..but maybe not everyone will
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, follow the directions. I dry brush and shave 24 hours prior to using and moisturize knees, elbows, etc right before use. I use the St. Tropez mitt with the product and it goes on flawlessly. I leave it on for 2-3 hours and rinse it off. I find the tan continues to develop overnight after rinsing, and I am left with a pretty (non-orange) glow. I am very pale so self-tanners scare me, but this one is very natural. I have had friends ask how I got such a nice sun kissed glow and they are surprised when I say it's fake! I will say it is not the darkest tan, which may bother some people, but I feel it is the most natural looking self tanner I have ever used. I also have found if I apply it two nights in a row I am a left with a deeper tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Iu2019ve tried tons of self tanning products but this is my favorite and I canu2019t recommend it enough. Between spray tans Iu2019ll use this. Quick and streak free with great color. My skin tone is pretty fair so like most people Iu2019m nervous about looking u201corangeu201d this is a great natural sun kissed brown color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok. This is by far the BEST self tanner Iu2019ve used so far. I think with any self tanner there will be parts of it that people complain about but the results are amazing that it doesnu2019t matter. **TIP** learn how to prep your skin well before using as any self tanner will not work properly if you donu2019t prep your skin! For one, this product does not smell terrible as most self tanners do. It has a light scent that dissipates/is no longer that noticeable after the guide colour is showered off. This product is a little tacky after it dries but itu2019s not the end of the world as I only have to deal with it for 3 hrs. If you read the bottle, it says itu2019s not recommended for use past 3 hrs. DO NOT SLEEP IN THIS TANNER IT WILL STAIN your BED SHEETS! Wear clothes you donu2019t care about while you wait for 1-3 hrs. Every time I use this I wear for 3 hrs and shower off and in the morning I am left with this gorgeous natural deep tan. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone
reviews.review_text: I used to order this product ALL the time and loved it! A warning that i either received a faulty product OR they've changed their ingredients. This recent bottle stained all my sheets and clothes orange/pink after washing in the washing machine. Steer clear for now until they figure out the new ingredients!

reviews.review_title: will always go back to this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: st tropez in general has always given me such a nice tan on my extremely pale skin. fades evenly, smells good, not too sticky upon application and looks natural. but this specific one i lovee because i can wash it off after a couple hours and it smells amazing. its also a one size fits all because you can control how dark you wanna get. so worth the money. iu2019ve tried other brands sephora carries and hated it. iu2019ll never switch again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am constantly using self tanner especially during the winter time and when the sun is no longer out. This is my all time favorite self tanner. I have used many of the St. Tropez products, and this has to be one of my favorites. I use this self tanner only on my body and avoiding my face. I typically will exfoliate a day before and then apply the self tanner the next day. Iu2019ll wear it for three hours and then rinse off and shower normally. The tan is so natural and lasts for so long. With other tanners, I will have to reapply almost everyday or as often as possible because they become patchy. This tanner gives you a tan that lasts for days that makes you look like you just went to the beach without making your orange or patchy. I LOVE THIS!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, the positives. It's nice that you only need to have it on for 3 hours. The finish is perfect, even and not patchy at all, smoother than their classic tan. Does not stain. It lasts a good few days. That said, I was pretty disappointed with this product. I'm ghostly pale so I didn't expect to get super dark, but after 3+ hours I was only slightly tanned. I have gotten darker with their classic tan. The thing I really dislike is that you don't actually get a deeper colour as time goes on, rather you become bronzier and more yellow-ish. It's not orange or anything, but it definitely isn't the nice brown tone advertised, either. This isn't an actual express tan; the colour still takes 8 hours to develop, even if you can wash it off in 3. Also, I found that the smell lingered the entire time I wore the tan -- perfume and body lotion covered it, but it was there until I scrubbed it off (but this is true of every tan I've tried).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it based on all the great reviews but it wasnu2019t for me. I left on for 3 hrs but the tan was faint. I put it on again and kept it on over night. The mousse does not dry, you feel sticky the entire time you have it on. I canu2019t stand the smell and for the results, itu2019s not worth it for me. The resulting tan was too orange and didnu2019t look natural on me. I also noticed the coloring was rubbing off on the inside of my bra band.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t sure if this product will work on me but I was really surprised! I recommend to leave it for a full night for a full summer beach vacation look . My only complaint would be that it last at least 2 weeks(If you have a skin care routine it will last 2 days) and itu2019s kinda expensive so I only use it for special occasions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Never used any self tanners before. I like the fact that it was easy to apply and absorbed fast. 3 hours is not too terribly long to wait before rinsing it off. Very nice natural looking tan :) with no sun! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells much better than the old version did. Iu2019m super pale so it worked well, nice colour. Donu2019t know how well itu2019d work with darker skin tones though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this self tanner. Iu2019m not very familiar with self tanners or how to use them, but this one was very easy to use and it didnu2019t leave me orange which was my biggest worry. It worked just like the reviews online said it would and then some. I loved the colour it left my skin. It was very natural and I received several compliments. I will definitely continue to use this product! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, itu2019s great in a PINCH! But not long lasting or dark at all. Great for a backup tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this self tanner and have experiment it many ways. For the best results, I exfoliate and do hair removal the day before, then apply the tanner before i go to bed and sleep with it on. It gives me a nice tan that doesnu2019t look fake or orange or anything. For those who say they have very light tans, I would say most likely didnu2019t exfoliate or leave it on for long enough. 1 hour will give you a very light glow, 3+ hours will give you the darkest tan you can get. The only thing is, it is really sticky and does feel like it doesnu2019t dry down completely, it doesnu2019t bother me though which is why I continue to use it. Iu2019m probably going to try the classic tanner next, however I do like this one because I could hypothetically wash it off after 3 hours and get the same tan as I would if I left it on for 8 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this since I needed something in a hurry and my order for Loving Tan wasnu2019t going to arrive in time. It doesnu2019t get very dark (I left it on for 5 hours), was basically gone after I showered the next day and fades super splotchy. Not like Loving Tan that fades beautifully and gets you to that perfect golden olive tan.   Two stars... one for how easy it was to apply and the second for how nice it applied around my knees and elbows.  Will still be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so pale, Iu2019ve gotten comments on it my whole life. I have used this self tanner for years ! Iu2019ve messed it up and ended splotchy because I was lazy, so in case you are afraid I will tell you how to apply: exfoliate & shave minimum 12 hours before application. Do not moisturize in between exfoliating and applying, donu2019t apply deodorant, or anything else on your skin. When ready to apply, slather a moisturizer HEAVILY on feet/ankles (the easiest place to mess up), and lightly on knees, elbows, and other dry places with thin skin. Then apply the mousse using the mitt and buff until you think youu2019re done, then 1 minute longer. Try to stay in A/C, do not sweat or be active for at least 2 hours before a cold shower. I recommend using a makeup wipe for excess product along hairline, nose, and neck if using for face, but not on dry areas as you will have white spots.  My best tip is to shower in only cold water when wearing the product. Your tan will last so much longer! Moisturize a ton between applications and completely remove/exfoliate the tan before the next app.  The best tanner if you follow the guidelines! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried so many selftanners and always got that orange tone but this is different. It is the most natural color on fair to light skin and it is very easy to apply. I love it!

reviews.review_title: Great even for very pale people!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best tanner, it is not super dramatic. I am very very pale and it still looks good on me.

reviews.review_title: BUY THE CLASSIC - AVOID THIS VERSION
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the classic St Tropez for a long time and absolutely LOVE it, I so decided to give this a try since my local store was out of the classic. Total waste of money! This is the stickiest self tanner Iu2019ve ever used - it never dries down (so confused why some reviews says it does?) and after leaving it on well beyond the recommended 3 hours for a darker tan, I barely have a slight glow - and I have porcelain skin. Canu2019t imagine any color would show up at all on someone with a starting tone even 1 shade darker than me. Wouldu2019ve given it 1 star but decided to throw on an extra star because the color, though VERY slight, is a natural tan color and not orange like many drugstore formulas. Do yourself a favor and just stick to the classic bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I've sprung for anything more expensive than jergens or banana boat & I have ZERO regrets. In fact, I wish I'd done it sooner. I'm a ghostly human so usually look somewhat orangey with any self tanner. Not this. VERY natural tone & quite dark! I also purchased the applicator mit & think that helped with the super even application. It's been almost a week & it might be starting to fade slightly but not in a weird obvious patchy way like all others I've tried. I'm a convert.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used the classic tan for years and tried the express when I had an event to go to, so I was able to shower the product off and be sure I wouldnu2019t get any on my dress. It worked perfectly!  Iu2019ve also slept with the express on over night and it just gives you an even darker tan! Amazing.  Iu2019m naturally very pale and I tried their u201cdarku201d tanning mouse which was a weird practically green colour and just made me look like I was dirty!  The express mousse if you leave it longer than 3 hours just gives you a very natural looking dark tan.  Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never written a review here, so that should say something about how much I love this product! I truly donu2019t know how some people donu2019t like it. I do sleep in it instead of waiting only 3 hours, so Iu2019m not sure how it holds up then, but the color it gives me overnight is absolutely beautiful and lasts. Itu2019s currently Monday and I still have tons of color from when I applied it last Wednesday, and that is without moisturizing and using a loofa in the shower every day. Itu2019s also incredibly easy to apply evenly and I love the cosmetic bronzers. A little bit goes a long way and it is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Left on for 6 hours and had a slight glow. Iu2019m fair to light skin toned, disappointed in the color payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m super pale and this gives me a very natural color. It is very sticky while Iu2019m waiting for it to develop but I only leave it on for 1.5 hours before washing it off. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is afraid of the sun but wants a natural tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is the best! I have fair skin and it was easy to apply with a rubber glove. I only did my legs (left on for one hour) and it was a perfect match for the top of my body. Takes 8hrs to see full processed colour. Smell is not great but Iu2019m ok with that. One wash and the smell is gone. Does not rub off on clothes and lasts about two weeks. Does not have an orange tone either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t like it. The tan was very orange instead of a nice bronze color.. I would not buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When this was the only self tanner Iu2019d tried, I thought it was amazing. Now, I donu2019t really like it anymore. Compared to others, it doesnu2019t spread as smoothly, itu2019s patchier, fades faster, and doesnu2019t get super dark, all for a pretty high price. The best thing about it is that it develops really quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this self tanner. I've been someone who has gotten spray tans for pretty much any event in the last 6 years. I wanted something to help me feel better about my paleness while in quarantine and this was the answer. I have gotten so many compliments about how natural it looks. For a deeper tan, I apply again two days after the initial application. I definitely recommend purchasing the mitt as well for easy-application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tan is really subtle, I didnu2019t notice that much of a difference after leaving it on for the recommended 3hrs for a darker result. It drys quickly and doesnu2019t transfer to your clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this today followed all directions even used the glove recommended. My legs got almost no colour. My hands and feet are slightly tanned but not any other parts of my body I sat for 3 hours after applying. Very disappointed for the price ! Used Jergens instant sun and it was amazing I would highly suggest buying that for $9 instead.

reviews.review_title: Best St. Tropez product; tacky until washed off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried multiple St. Tropez products, such as the face mist, the classic bronzing mousse, the dark bronzing mousse (not the express version), the classic mist version, the Wash-off shower version, etc. This is by far the one that yields the darkest tan the quickest. With the others, you almost have to apply it and leave it on for at least 8 hours, and in order to get the darkness I desire, Iu2019d have to do it for three days consecutively to reach my chosen tan. Then, those options tended to fade quickly and Iu2019d feel like I needed to use more every other day to maintain the colour I wanted. This is different! This I can use once every 5 days if not a week (depending on if you use moisturizer after showering for longevity). I leave it on for three hours and wash it off, and after a few more hours, Iu2019m quite dark! However, I deducted one star as the buyer should beware that it is quite tacky feeling for those 3 hours. I make a point to use it when I know I donu2019t have to go anywhere for at least 3 hours, and I wear long pants to avoid the colour guard from getting on things such as my couch as it will rub off onto other fabrics! If you can handle feeling a little sticky for three hours, itu2019s worth it. I wasnu2019t able to continue using their other products as I hated the tacky feeling for 8 hours and the result wasnu2019t nearly worth it. But for 3 hours with the express, and being able to shower it off right after while it continues to darken, itu2019s a fair trade off in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best tanner Iu2019ve ever used. I am really pale, copper haired. It makes me look perfectly tanned in 3 hours. Normal tanning products you donu2019t see anything u til the following day this one you see some results immediately but really kicks in as the others in the morning. The smell isnu2019t to bad it had a perfume smell That kicks in after a few hours so I wouldnu2019t sit on your furniture unless you want it to stink for weeks. The fading isnu2019t bad either after 5 days I needed a redo but I still had some color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a 21 year old pale female, I bought this product hoping it would give me a nice tan but instead there was no effect on my body. I applied this product with a mitt like the application video suggests, left on for three hours and then rinsed off and my skin colour had not changed. I went to bed thinking maybe in the morning there will be a difference but there wasnt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing product!! It may be a bit pricey but itu2019s worth every penny as it lasts a LONG time and if you buy it with the mitt itu2019s basically impossible to mess up. Always leaves me looking naturally tanned and it lasts about a week if you do it right (moisturizer, exfoliate before, etc.) definitely recommend purchasing this if youu2019re even considering it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you're like me and rarely see the sun then you will really enjoy this. My foundation color is ghostly white and using this product gives me a very healthy color. Would purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After hearing great things about St. Tropez self tanners, I decided to give this a try. I have pretty sensitive skin and besides irritating my skin, this product didn't give me the color I wanted. The only upside was that it smells pretty nice.

reviews.review_title: go to tan in a bottle.
reviews.review_text: Straightforward. It works well! Youu2019ll need gloves or an exfoliated towed to clean the palm of your hands after application. Always start subtle and build the glow. Make sure your skin is exfoliated and hydrated before. Itu2019s smells great. May stain towel or sheets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am awful at applying self tan but this product is super easy and never comes out streaky! Does smell, but that is to be expected with tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using tanning products for years, and Iu2019ve always enjoyed the St Tropez line. Got this product on a whim and let me just say, iu2019ve NEVER had a smoother, more natural tan with their other products. This is so perfect, friends were shocked when I said my tan came from a bottle. I pair this with their luxe double sided mitt and my tan comes out perfect, even around tricky areas like fingers and toes that often betray me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 this is the only self tanner I trust, it never makes me orange and it looks super natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH. It worked so nicely and after just one use I was the same shade as I was last summer after tanning for WEEKS. The instructions were very clear so anyone who left a bad review just doesnu2019t know how to use this product properly. I went from using the shade Ceylan in my Nars foundation to using Stromboli if you're wondering how much darker I got.  How to use it properly:  Make sure you exfoliate, shave & moisturize your skin 3-24 hrs prior to using it. Use a tanning mitt for best results. Start by applying on areas with thicker skin and use the excess to apply on areas like wrists, knees, and elbows where the skin is thinner. Let it dry before wearing clothes again and leave it on for 1-3 hours depending on how dark you want to get. I left it on for 2.5 hours and then washed it off with just some warm water without scrubbing too hard. The tan will instantly wash off but will reappear within hours as it sets into your skin. It takes up to 8 hours after washing for you to see the final product.   This was my first time using a self-tanner and I only got some patchy spots on my stomach because I forgot to exfoliate it. My tan was flawless besides that. Will be buying again and recommending to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best self tanner Iu2019ve ever used! Easy to apply (buy a tanning glove, it helps a lot) and I like that after I wash it off my skin feels soft and I donu2019t have to worry about staining my clothes. The color is also really nice and does not turn me orange.  The only issue I have had is some minor transfer of color onto the neckline of my clothes from sweating.

reviews.review_title: Best self-tanning product Iu2019ve ever used.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best self-tanner Iu2019ve ever used, and believe me - Iu2019ve tried many.   The key to a seriously good tan aside from a great product is how well you prep and apply. Always, always shower, shave, and then diligently exfoliate prior to application with a tanning mitt. You can pick up cheap exfoliating gloves from Walmart. Scour the heck out of everywhere including feet, ankles and wrists. Be sure your body is completely dry. Apply a good thick moisturizer to your hands and feet (possibly elbows and knees depending on your skin) and proceed to apply 2 or 3 pumps to independent sections of your body avoiding the wrists and ankles. Go in with an old makeup brush with 1/4 of a pump on ankles, feet, wrists and hands. I personally use the leftover stuff on the mitt after carefully buffing out my body to gently go over my face.   I left this on for 4 hours (stayed nekkid for the first hour) then rinsed and generally applied moisturizer everywhere. The next day tan was fully developed and was perfect.   The most even and nicely coloured self-tanning product Iu2019ve ever got my hands on. Highly recommend and well worth the $$.

reviews.review_title: Bronzed and natural looking, great for pale skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I freaking love this product. The best self-tanner I have ever used. Multiple people have told me how tanned and how natural my tan looks. I have extremely fair skin and this gives me a beautiful bronzed glow. I normally put the product on at night, sleep in it, and wash off the next day for best results. Highly recommend getting the tanning mitt as well because it keeps your hands clean and gives an even spread. I love love love this product so much and its so much healthier to use a self-tanner than sit for hours in the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. I can not believe how amazing this product is. After one use only I get this golden tan look and even after a few showers o still have the same look. Easy to apply and for the price your saving so much money getting that same  salon look for less, so do not hesitate to get it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tan ! Iu2019ve tried a lot ! But this one is perfect ! Dry fast, no transfer, not a strong smell ! I used it for my body only so Iu2019ve purchase the face mist also which is really amazing too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite self tanner period. Iu2019ve used it for 2 years, and nothing else comes close. Always use the mitt! I wash my hands after applying to my body, and then I go over the backs of them with the mitt. I almost always sleep in it. I usually apply before bed, and if itu2019s been at least an hour, I will wash my hands so theyu2019re not so dark before going to sleep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good self tanner product. Remember to really blend and blend quickly, otherwise this dries kind of fast and you may end up with a little bit of streaks. I have pale/fair skin and I leave this on for a little more then 3 hours to really get a noticeable tan. 1 hour definitely does not do much! Not the best scent but it is still overall a good product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to by the original formula (the one in the white bottle) but ended up liking this one even more! Not that there's anything wrong with the original, but it didn't give me the toasted look I was looking for. I can usually get the same effect with this one if I leave it on for two hours, but since I like my tans to be a little on the darker side, sometimes I leave it on overnight. I know it says it's not recommended, but I did this at least five times and always loved the result; golden tan that doesn't look orange. Also, I always apply it with a mitt and make note of washing my hands 2 hours after applying so my hands are not too dark (otherwise, they will look super weird, like gloves). I also supplement with the Watermelon Gradual Tanner about 2-3 times a week to keep my tan looking good for longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I tried the regular st tropez that comes in a white bottle.. I found that to be way too light for me. So light to where I would have to apply two to three days in a row to get my desired color.. which then results in lots of patchy-ness and streaks. I put this on and even though it says three hours, I leave it on for like 6-7 and it leaves the most beautiful color on me. And it fades off super nicely on me as long as I keep up on moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This just simply doesnu2019t work. Iu2019m very fair right now and I left this on for 3 and a half hours and it looks the exact same. I even took picture to see the before and after. What am I doing wrong!!! I could maybe see this being okay if youu2019re in a bind and need some sort of tan ASAP, but honestly you basically look the exact same itu2019s not even worth sitting around sticky for 3 hours. I love their other products, try the classic mouse over this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not sure what I am doing wrong here. I have fair European skin. I usually love St. Tropez products. When I apply it I have a nice tan right after as well as after the first shower. It doesn't stain clothes or has a strong tan smell. BUT the next day (2 showers after) I barely have any tan left! If I want this to work I have to self tan almost every day. =(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While this isnu2019t the darkest tan, it definitely works in a pinch! The green hue allows it to set as a more natural tan than the orangey competitors.  It is a little sticky, but itu2019s temporary and the smell isnu2019t horrid. This isnu2019t the first St. Tropez product Iu2019ve used, and itu2019s not my favorite from them, but I would definitely use it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applied with St. Tropez tanning mitt - easy to apply and tan turned out even. Not supposed to be left on for more than 3 hours (or overnight). I am light-medium skinned and got a good glow with leaving it on for 2-3 hours before washing off! Very natural looking!

reviews.review_title: Thereu2019s a reason for the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Can feel a little bit sticky but works well for a quick tan. Lasts several days after application, Iu2019m almost a week out and still have a good glow

reviews.review_title: Before and after pics no edits
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great for quick tans, I used the st tropez mit to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fake tan all the and use a lot of different fake tanning products (St.Tropez Dark Bronzing Mousse, Isle of Paradise, Bondi Sands), and this product has left me by far the most disappointed. If you're someone looking for a dark tan, go with the St. Tropez Dark Tanning Mouse. The Tan Express s more orange than the other St. Tropez products and left weird patchy pale spots on the inside of my armpits and behind my knees. If you're wanting an even application or a darker look, use something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m very fair skin, so I left this on for 3.5 hours. Subtle natural color, but definitely not the darkest faux tan Iu2019ve ever had. Easy application and no super harsh smell. I did forget to moisturize one dry patch of skin, which now has an oompa- look to it, but that was my own fault.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self tanner I have ever tried. I use this every week. I leave it on for 2-3 hours and then the tan develops in 8 hours. The tan lasts for a week after tanning. I love the color and I can get very tan in just a few hours. I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: excellent color, it's a good choice but I'm honestly looking for another type of bronzer and this promises too much but I don't really know

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Out of aaaalllll the tanning mousseu2019s Iu2019ve tried, this is by far the best. Itu2019s a tad pricey, but it does last a while. The guide colour quickly fades into a nice brown, but listen to what the box says and do not leave it on for more than three hours or else it will become patchy. I like that I donu2019t have to wait eight hours to rinse it off, and this is definitely the most natural tanning mousse Iu2019ve ever tried! I love being as dark as my body will let me so itu2019s nice to know that with this, I will look like I came back from somewhere and not look orange. But yeah, at the longest, wash off after 3 hours if you want to go dark. ** And donu2019t use any loofas or anything, just water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very fair skinned and whether left on for an hour or 3  the color always looks so natural and gorgeous. I mainly tan my face and legs, and while I know this product isn't designed for the face, I used it anyway. However, I definitely wouldn't recommend using on your face- this breaks me out SO BAD, which is unfortunate because I love it and my skin is usually fairly tolerant of most products, so I was surprised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m fair skinned and always crunched for time. This stuff is efficient, natural looking and never streaks. I use it with the Isle of Paradise primer spray, and itu2019s a dream. I get a golden glow with so little prep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I went into Sephora wanting the ultra dark... Iu2019m fair skinned but the girl told me to use this one and that it leaves her darker than her vacation tan... I washed it off and saw no difference. Iu2019m disappointed and debating on going into return it and buy the one I actually wanted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did nothing for me, I left it on longer than the maximum time and the color completely washed off and made no difference. Iu2019ve used plenty of self tanners and this one Is the worst !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this and the original St. Tropez but keep coming back to this one for a few reasons.  1. Love the results, doesn't look orange in the slightest 2. DOES NOT STAIN ONCE WASHED OFF!!  So yes, I leave it on for 6-8 hours then wash off. In the 6-8hr period it could stain clothes/bedding so be smart about what your wearing. However, once you do the wash off part, it won't bleed. Went to the gym in a white tank and zero orange. Don't know how it works but cannot get enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this and the original St. Tropez but keep coming back to this one for a few reasons.  1. Love the results, doesn't look orange in the slightest 2. DOES NOT STAIN ONCE WASHED OFF!!  So yes, I leave it on for 6-8 hours then wash off. In the 6-8hr period it could stain clothes/bedding so be smart about what your wearing. However, once you do the wash off part, it won't bleed. Went to the gym in a white tank and zero orange. Don't know how it works but cannot get enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Of course use the mitt. Unbeatable natural color with zero streaks. Be aware it has a smell the next day .. like body odor. Night of youu2019re fine! No sunless tanner is perfect. Iu2019m trying out their new water mousse next with the tropical scent to see if that helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is awesome! Put it on my face too and it looks natural.

reviews.review_title: Finally a fake tanner that I can rave about!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!  I am a redhead, so very pale skin, and I've tried a few tanning products in the past and they just look fake and orange.  I bought this and the mitt just a couple days ago, and I decided to do just one leg for 1 hour to test it out before I committed fully.  And I am so impressed!  It does look like it might be patchy or orange-y when you first apply it but I waited the hour then showered, even used a loofah to wash and when I woke up this morning it was just a beautiful light tan color.  I'll def do the other leg and arms, and the rest of the bits tonight!  I really recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanner I have tried lately. Next time I wont buy the express though because I like to put my self tanner on at night. It states on the bottle leaving it on for more than 3 hours is not recommended.
