reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this self tan for upwards of four years now - I like this more than the classic version as you get the same colour results in less time and don't need to wear overnight. I am constantly getting compliments on my tan/skin colour - it looks real. I can get the perfect tan that lasts weeks (fades beautifully) and best of all my extremely sensitive skin (dry, itchy, rashy my entire life) never negatively reacts to this self tanner - 10/10 recommend to everyone. The bottle last me approximately 6 months or at least a minimum of 5 applications. Each application lasts me approximately 3 weeks or a minimum of 10 days.   This tan does not come out orange - I am very fair skinned... dare I say, paler than the moon.   TIP: letting your tan fade all the way down and exfoliating will give a better result than tanning again before the prior tan has fully faded/been removed - layering this self tanner will result in patchy fading which is NOT cute  TIP: you can use this to contour your face and body so when you're natural you still looked SNATCHED - be your own tan artist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the ease of this product, but not crazy about the smell. Although, all tanners smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: great color, not orange. no smell. goes on evenly if you exfoliate and moisturize according to the directions. and use a mitt! if you have to have your hands in water for hours at a time, prepare yourself for the inverse farmer's tan.

reviews.review_title: Not for Casual Applications - Expert Level
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so here's the thing... this product is fantastic, but it's absolutely NOT for beginners & cannot be applied lazily. The final color is gorgeous & could only be achieved by at least 2-3 applications of the original mousse; it really is a fantastic product... if used correctly. haha So minus 1 star only for it's inability to be user friendly.   I love St. Tropez products; I've been using them for over 7 years when I first got a set in THE best 500 pt. perk box. The original mousse spoils you! There is SO much room for error with it that it's easy to get lazier with each passing application, especially if you have all the products in the line.   With my first application of this particular mousse, I did my usual thing: light exfoliation with my gloves in the shower, casually used whatever body lotion was within reach, applied in a circular motion with my mitt, & looked over my worked in a large mirror with sun light. At first it looked fantastic, another job well done... until it developed...  I spent entirely too much time with baking soda, my exfoliant, a tanning brush, a dry brush, & a mirror after that folks. Do not be me... be the girl you were that first time you stood in the mirror all those years ago AFTER the actual first time you self-tanned, armed with internet knowledge & the moxy to have the PERFECT self-tan! That girl is inside all of us & SHE is needed for this product, not the lazy house cat version of yourself that grew accustom to a whatever routine.

reviews.review_title: The best of all St. Tropez products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried the regular bronzing mousse, the dark mousse, and this express mousse. The express is by far the best tan, least streaky, and longest lasting. I have pale Irish skin and people always think this is a natural tan. I usually leave it on for 6-8 hours like a regular self tan, and get a nice tan. The plus side is if I only have a few hours, I can still get a good tan. The longer you leave it on, the darker, id say up to about 10 hours long and then it prob doesnu2019t make a difference. Never had problems with streaks with this one, like I did with the dark mousse. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t even think about it, just buy it. I have tried all the self tanners, from cheap to high dollar. It will not disappoint. No streaks, no nasty smell, just a great self tan. Leave on for about a hr, shower & bam golden goddess!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product provides the darkest tan Iu2019ve had from a sunless tanner. Be sure to utilize a nit for application and wear dark colors as the color will transfer if it rains or you sweat. I find it difficult to apply on the feet and ankles as itu2019ll come out streaky. It also comes off in a patchy way.

reviews.review_title: Works better than the regular one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the original one first and loved that one, but I love this one even more!! I find this stuff stains sheets so I prefer wearing it during the day and for shorter periods of time rather than 8+ hours. I put it on and waited 3 hours before showering. Even after showering the colour kept developing for another 8 or so hours. Only point I have to dock: It does make you smell more than the regular mousse and even after showering. The smell goes away about a day later but still a bit annoying. Would still definitely recommend!! Iu2019m pasty as heck and I look very naturally tanned now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!! This stuff is unreal! First off I am naturally tan (half Italian and half creole) and this is the first time Iu2019ve ever used a self tanner. For an upcoming trip to Costa Rica I needed to tan the booty for my less coverage swimsuits:) but I wanted my body to be the same color - this was almost foolproof. You definitely need the mitt to spread it - it spreads so easy and evenly with zero streaks!!! I left the first time on for an hour - got about one shade tan bronze color it was beautiful. Second time I used it I left for 2.2 hours and i got another beautiful shade, but it looks natural like Iu2019ve been on vacation and just got back. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this mousse has coloring, so itu2019s easy to see where youu2019ve already applied it.  The mousse has a typical self tan smell, but itu2019s not horrible.  A nice bronze and even tan develops within a few hours. Only issue I had- some of it DID rub off onto my white sheets, which is why I knocked off a star.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff went bad before I even got half way through the bottle. The tan fades blotchy and Itu2019s impossible to get off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first time I have ever used a selftanner before, was reccomend to use this by my sister. I found it lasted quite a long time and had minimal streaking, faded nicely  aswell, I was really worried that I would look super orange in it ( because I am so pale) but it was a very nice tan color. The only thing I did not like was the price. Would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: works pretty well honestly but if you have fairly pale skin like me youu2019ll have to apply over 2 days. I left it on for 3 hours and I barely had any glow. Spray tans made me darker but this product smells way better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: St. Tropez Dark: great color, smell is fine, doesnu2019t leave you super sticky. Lasts about 5-7 days if taking good care of the tan.   St. Tropez Classic: color is okay, not as dark as I was hoping. Smell is fine, doesnu2019t feel sticky, stays about 3-5 days.   St. Tropez Express: great for a quick tan but stickier and smells more like tanner that other products Iu2019ve tried. Works very quickly but only lasts about 3 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this way better than the non-express. Better scent that doesnu2019t linger. I recommend getting a high end mitt to blend it. I use this on face and body and it last about 3-4 days before I re-apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried putting this on twice now for it to only last 3 days. I did 2 hours the first time and 2 1/2 hours the second. I remembered to exfoliate and I used lotion after showers to keep my skin hydrated.  I loved the color the first day. But two days later Iu2019m back to no tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best sunless tanner. Iu2019ve been using it for a couple of years now and have gotten so many others to use it. I have extremely pale skin and it gives me the best bronzed color. It is never streaky or orange. The color is very olive based. I would recommend the exfoliating mitt they sell if you plan to use regularly though to prevent tan build up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone
Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Background: I have been using St.Tropez for about two years now! I started by using the original formula but it was too light so I switched to the dark tanning mousse. I have now switched over to the express tan because I like it the most!   Pros:  * The formula really allows you to personalize your shade of tan. I generally leave the formula on for 3 hours (and sometimes sleep in it) to get the darkest shade possible. I then reapply it the following day to get my perfect shade.  * The tan lasts a long time as long as you continue to moisturize daily. I get at least 8 days of wear time with this tanner!   * The color is definitely not orange. Iu2019m very pale, so Iu2019m always concerned about coming off orange when using fake tanner. This tanner leaves a nice deep tan, I look so beachy and glowy!  Cons: * The smell of this tanner is by far the worst out of the St. Tropez line. Not only does it smell bad, but it lingers for DAYS. I find that I smell like tanner for about 3 days, and it gets worse when sweating. Itu2019s really not cute. If youu2019re going on a date or to an important event where you donu2019t want to smell like cat pee, Iu2019d seriously recommend applying this a few days beforehand so that the smell goes away!   Overall I really like this tanner and will continue to use it. However, if you truly hate the smell of tanner, this guy might not be for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this gave me a darker tan after leaving it on for the max time. The smell isn't awful. It goes on dark then when you shower it barely looks like you used tanner. A couple hours later you'll have a nice glow. Unfortunately, I feel like this feels pretty sticky on my skin for at least an hour after application. The product feels dry, just a little sticky on my skin. This is my go-to self tanner at the moment.

reviews.review_title: My favourite self tanner by far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self tanner I have ever used...and I have tried all of them.  I really love that you only have to have this on for three hours and then you can rinse it off (without soap).  The colour is beautiful, deep, and natural with minimal effort, and it fades gradually and naturally without being blotchy.  I took off a point because I find this product extremely sticky while its on, and it takes a long time to dry.  Also, while you get to rinse it off after 3 hours, it will still slightly stain your sheets or clothes until you can shower it off properly with soap after 8-10 hours.  All considered, this is a beautiful product and the best self tanning gets.

reviews.review_title: More time to do other things
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the St Mortiz tan for ten years before trying this one out last month. I absolutely adore it! No more sleeping in self tan and getting it on the sheets! Iu2019m very pale and the color is perfect even if left on three   hours. Worth the extra money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this mousse and I am in LOVE! First of all, if you apply it correctly with a mitt itu2019s virtually impossible to mess up. I have quite pale skin and I leave it on for 1.5-2 hours. The tan gradually builds after you wash it off and it is SO natural looking.   I had used it regularly for a few weeks and then stopped for about a week or so, allowing it to fade. After using it again, my co-worker literally said, u201cYou got your color back! I was worried about you last week, you were looking very pale and washed out.u201d  Basically, this fake tan looks so natural that it fooled my co-worker into thinking my skin is actually 2 shades darker.   The best part of this tanner is that it fades really evenly, and you can apply for 30 mins-1 hour if you just need to freshen it up.   Iu2019ve seen it work wonders on all skin tones, it really does adapt to your natural undertones!   10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_title: My Ride or Die Tanning Product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favourite tanning product! I am quite fair and like to keep a year round tan without UV.  It always looks so flawless AS LONG as I properly prepare and maintain. I strongly advise shaving, exfoliating, and moisturizing before application- and always re moisturizing after. Make sure to do your nails after too! White toe nail polish anyone?   I like to do it once a week (the night before I wash my sheets), sleep in it, and rinse in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time using a self tanner. This was easy to apply and very forgiving to a first time user. I was unsure of how this would look because I have freckles and light colored hair...but I found that after an hour and a half the color had developed to a nice golden tan that looks very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my mom and I love this stuff. We heard about it through Facebook and gave it a try. i love how itu2019s mousse and easy to put on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent for my fair skin! I got the mit to apply. Really nice color on my skin. I do notice it fades very spotty if you donu2019t take care and moisture well. But thatu2019s my own error. Itu2019s lasting me awhile too which is nice. Great to have on hand when I canu2019t get a spray tan appointment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it leaves terrible streaks. Iu2019ve never had a problem with streaks before. I do like the color but itu2019s VERY hard to get even. The smell is also good compared to other tanners. Will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried multiple self tanners and this one always stands out above the rest. My #1 go to for quick self tanning results. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gives such a natural color and it works. I will put this on and it stays for days. Worth the money and this bottle has lasted me much longer than expected. Not streaky! I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: got a perfect medium tan after leaving it on for just an hour and a half. really easy to apply and no blotchiness! it also smells surprisingly nice. I was worried at first because I've never self tanned before but it turned out amazing. I already have people asking me if I went on vacation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing product! I have used it 3 times now and still have three quarters of the bottle left. It is a great alternative to spray tanning at a salon because it is a much quicker process and you donu2019t need to leave it on for as long. I used the mitt to apply it, which made for extremely easy application and left me with a natural, streak-free tan. Super happy with this product and will definitely be repurchasing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of the WORST self tanners ive ever used. i had the mouse on for the maximum time it should be on (aka dark shade) and once i stepped in the shower, all the tan washed off and i was left with what i had before: pale skin. i have never been more disappointed with a product for i spent $50 to have the product not work and continue to be pale. my advice would be to purchase a different self tanner.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful even tan, wish it lasted longer...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first self tanner that I have used in 10 years. I prepped my skin very well by exfoliating (I used a glove and scrubbed everywhere), moisturized my elbows, wrists, armpits and ankles and used a mitt to apply. I left the tanner on for 2 hours before I rinsed it off. When you rinse it off you will not notice a difference but wait 8 hours and you will see a beautiful, even, golden tan. I was very happy with the result and it was easy to apply because of the color guard. The tan is very natural looking on my very fair skin. I received many compliments from my friends and everyone was surprised that it came from this. I love using this for special occasions but there are some downsides: Downside #1: Very sticky while waiting. Downside #2: Doesn't last very long - maybe 3 days. Overall, this product is great I just wish it lasted longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: loved this product.  Used the mitt and because it applies very evenly.  It is easy to see where you are applying.  Better than spray tanning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So this is my go to product! I never used a foam before or attempted a more dramatic change in skin tone so I watched a hundred YT videos before using this as I was nervous. I bought a kit with a body mit, face mit and back mit (to help reach your back) on Amazon and bought the mousse in store. I left mine on for two hours and could easily have done another hour without looking freakish as the color was beautiful and olive tones and golden not orange at all! So good for fair skinned, however if you are darker skinned I'd rec the dark mousse as this was almost the full time and on a darker skin tone wouldn't turn up much a difference. All in all I'll keep using it and people have asked me what I used and have rec to many people since then that are fair skinned. Watch some videos if you're new to a mousse and you'll get it down and save money! One spray tan is 40$ and for a whole bottle 42$ you can get 7 full body applications or more! Also I found the color and evenness much better since I'm applying it myself I did a good job not missing spots on my hands and wrists that were otherwise missed or spotty with spray tans. I also used a fat kabuki type makeup brush to apply to my face and since I wash my face 2 a day I used their purity facial mist every other night to keep my glow growing longer on my neck and face as it fades fast from washing there. But the rest of my body easily lasts 10 days with one 2 hours application, patting dry after showers and moisturizing! Only con is the color guard to see where you've applied it is very light even on my super fair skin and so you just have to go with where you felt it wet already for knowing where the application was so I deduced a star

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried everything over the years....this is the best I've tried... I put it on in the afternoon and left it on until the next morning's shower. It left a beautiful tan. No streaks, no dark spots. It lasted a week! Great product. Will be using all summer long...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: want a beautiful Tan? Use This....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I've tried so many self tanning products u2013 the organic ones, the drugstore ones, other St Tropez products u2013 and this one hits every mark. Looks natural! Goes on fast! Doesn't streak! Fades evenly! After the rinse, doesn't stain! DOESN'T SMELL! And, to top it off, the green tint to the mousse makes it easy to see where you've applied already. Exfoliation prior crucial, mitt necessary. I rinse off after one hour, put on a white dress, and go. I'll never go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks so real. Iu2019ve literally quit tanning and use this when I need some color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried every self-tanner on the market. This one takes the cake. Gives you an even, dark tan. I shower twice a day and the tan lasts me a solid week. A plus is that it smells amazing. Not like some that smell nasty. Would HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.review_title: Good self tanner for quick turnaround
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very pale and used this for the full time allotted. It looked really nice and I even did a second layer on my lower legs which are probably the palest part of my body. When I washed it off it was not as dark as I was hoping for but definitely looked natural which is very important. Not having to wear it overnight was very helpful. I used the exfoliating mitt and st tropez mitt to prep and apply respectively and had no issues with streaking or over application on hands/feet etc. My biggest gripe with the product is that I am allergic to the fragrance and it causes me to break out in a tiny red bumpy rash from the neck down. Otherwise this would be my go to self tan. Iu2019ve used other tanner with no problems and the 2 times Iu2019ve used this I get the same rash. Overall still a good product, just doesnu2019t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how my skin looks when I use this! The smell is not great, but thatu2019s to be expected with most tanners. It does take a while for my tan to develop, but it lasts for at least 7 days if you care for it properly. I usually put this on in the morning, wear it all day, and sleep in it overnight, then wash it off the next morning for the best results. Iu2019ve tried washing it off after a few hours but for me, the tan just isnu2019t dark enough by then. Naturally Iu2019m very pale, but this gives me a nice, dark, even tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my German pale skin, this product works well but isn't as dark as I'd like but I can use a few days later and keep the color.  As with any self tanner, you need to be careful leaving extra product anywhere.  Otherwise there will be an obvious dark spot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Takes longer to dry, smells bad and came out orange. I think Iu2019ll stick to the original version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this stuff. I am not sure Iu2019ll repurchase. Iu2019m allergic so after a while I get hives and uncontrollable itch around arms and bCk of legs..but I used it til it was gone. I know I love the color and application so I may just reorder and leave for less time. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite self tanner and Iu2019ve tried just about everything out there. I always come back to this. I have the palest, dry, sensitive skin. It gives an amazing olive tone that fades evenly if you take care of your skin. I even use it on the perimeter of my face and it doesnu2019t break me out. It can clog my pores if I put it on my t-zone. Also, hands and feet arenu2019t a problem with this stuff. My only complaint is that is it a bit drying. After you rinse and apply moisturizer though, your skin looks beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is awesome. I use the mitt to apply and it gives great coverage. Just be careful with your hands and feet. I suggest Applying to your hands and feet last and washing your hands within 30 minutes of applying. Also use the prep and maintain lotion before the tanning lotion I used it on my palms but I should have used it more on my hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re trying to decide between this and the classic mousse, go with the classic. Iu2019ve been self tanning for about 8 years now and the st. Tropez classic become my go to after having tried everything from jergens to mystique, but like many others I was very enticed by the thought of not having to sleep in that self tan smell for hours. I applied this with the mit after going through the exfoliate/shave/moisturizing dry areas routine. It didnu2019t go on as smooth as the other mousse, but it still had a good guide color so I applied it all over and waited 2.5 hours before washing off.  (Tip: put your mit over a hairbrush to help reach your back) Six hours later there wasnu2019t much tan showing up, so I went to bed and the next morning I had a light tan but not as much color as I was used to so it was disappointing. After a closer look I found that that it hadnu2019t worked as well on my chest or shins, and overall the color payoff wasnu2019t very even.  All in all, itu2019s okay but if youu2019re going to spend this much go for the classic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this self-tanner. It goes on flawless. No streaks or weird blotches. I love that you can leave it on for longer or wash it off sooner depending on your desired color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend! This is a great product for someone like me who is new to self tanning, I was getting tired of using gradual moisturizers from the drugstore, by the time I got some color it would start to flake and fade so I wanted something that would last at least a week and this is it! Iu2019m very pale so I feel like I need just a little color but I want it to look natural, not super dark, the first time I tried it I did it for an hour, it was very subtle, no one around me even noticed I had used tanner. The 2nd time I did two hours and I got just a little more color, this last time I kept it on for 2.5 hours and it wasnu2019t super dark, so I donu2019t think doing it for 3 hours would look crazy dark like I originally had thought it might do. So itu2019s very subtle, even if you use it the full three hours, you arenu2019t going to end up really dark, just a few shades darker than your natural color. It also didnu2019t feel super sticky or really have much of a smell to me which was a relief, I hate that sticky feeling you can get from tanners and nobody likes that self tanner smell. It also lasted about 8 days before I felt like it started to fade, I will continue to buy for sure, I love the subtle, non orange color it gives me and the shorter u2018marinatingu2019 time before you can shower it off. Be sure to exfoliate well and use a mitt, that will keep your fingers from turning orange/brown and help get the color even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love St Tropez, have used the original mousse formula for over a year now and loved, so I thought I'd give this a shot. It's really really difficult to evenly apply, and doesn't seem to darken as well as the original mousse. Also fills the room with a suffocating mist, which is not so nice. The only good thing about it is the ability to get hard to reach places, like your back. But I would not recommend this at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love St Tropez self tanner. The color of the mousse is alittle worrisome, it comes out an ugly green. When you first put the tanner on it looks really light, you can keep it on for 1,2 or 3 hrs then rinse off in shower with water only. After leaving on for 3 hrs it looked light but the next morning it was such a pretty color, no streaks, no awful smells. I love this product and will use it all summer. Iu2019ve used it twice and you canu2019t tell Iu2019ve used any by the feel of the bottle!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: SO GOOD! Gives great color but does stick to dry spots so be careful. Also dries pretty quick so make sure not to leave it streaky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a beginner at self tanning and was so scared to try because I feared patchiness and uneven spots. Let me tell you this stuff worked amazing. I used with their tanning mitt and left for 2 hours it gave me a beautiful golden tan. Only complain is it stinks like French fry grease and doesnu2019t come off after u shower it takes two showers to get the smell off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using a self tanner after a number of years.. The tanning mitt is a must and makes application much easier. I followed the instructions and put lotion on elbows and ankles, the dry skin areas.  I left the mousse on for 1.5 hours since it was my first time and I didnu2019t know what to expect. In the shower it seemed like everything washed off (when you put on the mousse, you look fairly dark).  I showered with water only. After a few hours I did notice a self tanning smell, but it wasnu2019t to bad.  Next morning I saw much better results, my skin developed a nice tan which is very different from what I saw the night before, which was almost no colour.  I overdid it in the underarm area as well as top of my hands which next time I will go very light on.. I did notice some areas were darker and I remember that I may have gone over them twice when applying, so make sure you only go over the area once.  Overall a nice colour! I would just be more careful when applying next time.

reviews.review_title: Needs longer to work than a few hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this product it didn't work at all. I wore the product for 1.5 hours and when i rinsed off, there was no colour. I decided to try it again the next night and wore it all night. The second time I did get a nice tan, not very dark though. I liked how even my tan was, no streaks, very natural golden colour. I used Vita Liberata gradual lotion before and the colour of the Vita Liberata was worse, more orange. Your skin does feel sticky after using. The smell was quite pleasant, I would describe it like a shampoo smell. I only noticed a faint DHA smell. I will probably try the classic mousse next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best self tanner Iu2019ve used yet, leave it on overnight, darkest most golden brown tanner, always get so many compliments!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i recently bought this self tanner for an important event i had to attend, and wanted a sun kissed glow! after showering and doing the usual self tanner steps, i even got my bf to help me apply to my back (and hes never done this prior)  it turned out amazing! streak free and a beautiful bronzed look!  im so happy with the outcome and its so user friendly especially if your new with applying self tanners :) would definitely recommend this product just make sure you purchase the mitt as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this on a whim....  Does it work? Yes Does it smell? Yes Is it even? Yes Is it easy to apply? Yes Is it sticky on the skin? Yes Do you really get tan in after just 1hr? Yes What about 3hrs? Yes yes yes Is it worth buying? Yes! Absolutely!  Super impressed. I donu2019t mind all the yesu2019s knowing I will be washing it off in as little as 1hr. I have olive skin so I didnu2019t know how dark this would actually get me. In only 1 hr I was much darker. 3hrs I was nice and tan. I did it again the next evening and washed it off in 2hrs. I have tried a lot of tanners and this is by far one of the quickest and most effective I have tried. Whoo hoo! Vacation here I come!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so nervous to try this product but I finally did and I love it! I have fair freckle skin and I used this for the first time last night. I started off exfoliating my skin really well in the shower. Then I applied lotion to my knees hands elbows and tops of my feet and ankle bone. The. I applied this all over with the mit. I let it dry naked for about 15 minutes then put on a night shirt and went to bed. The next day I woke up and showered. My tan is so pretty and even and glowy. I love it and just bought another bottle. I also used the sheet mask from this brand and love it also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the classic for 1.5 years and just tried this one and wonu2019t go back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an incredibly natural tan. I wouldn't say that it gets extremely dark however using this during the winter makes me look as tan as I naturally would during the summer which I appreciate not looking silly and overdone. If you're a beginner with self-tans I would say that this is your best bet because it blends out very easily and is easy to maintain. It last me over a week and a half which is also amazing and it faded so evenly (even though I rarely moisturized to maintain).

reviews.review_title: Been using it for 6 years - even skin tone!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about six years now and am totally obsessed! It's a great alternative to tanning beds (obviously) and you can usually get about 8 tans out of the bottle depending on how much you use. Considering an airbrush is about 50-60 USD not including tip, this will definitely save you a couple hundred dollars while still providing a comparable look in terms of color and tone.   This product is brown base as well, so you do not orange. I have olive-tan skin on the darker side so I tend to leave it on for 2.5-3 hours; if you have fairer skin I would recommend leaving it on for 1-1.5 hours to avoid any dramatic lines or abnormal looks.   This product has a bronzer in it to help you know hwere you have put it on, that is what will wash off in the shower. However, once you put it on you should plan to be inside for the duration of the tan, because it will look a bit wild until you wash off the excess. Your skin will then continue to pigment over the next few hours.   I use this all over my body, including my face despite St Tropez not necessarily recommending it for use on face. I have sensitive skin and have not had any issues with breakouts on my face as a result.   This product also does a great job of evening skin tone and giving a super natural look which allows you to go without makeup for almost a week. This is great if you have any sort of hyper pigmentation that you consistently try to hide.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best self tanner! Looks natural and radiant! Love it

reviews.review_title: Good product as a base tan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is relatively easy to use (if you watch youtube tutorials

reviews.review_title: YES! FAIR LADIES CAN GLOW TOO!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! Have used this for the past three years and there is no equal! Holy grail of an instant tanner, no orange-y undertone. Perfect for any event, I swipe it on the afternoon before, rinse off after 3 hours and by the following morning I am greeted in the mirror by some fabulous island jet-setter that could not possibly be me! do not be afraid fair ladies to leave on the full three hours. It is a perfect healthy glow and does not grab too dark

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to self tanner at the moment! The color looks very natural if you exfoliate before use and apply it properly. Iu2019m very light skinned and 2 hours left on is about perfect to look tanned. The color will continue to get darker after showering off the product. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I canu2019t use it on my face or it will cause acne. Iu2019m hoping they come out with a more effective face tanner that wonu2019t cause acne. The scent also has that classic self tanner smell to it thatu2019s not so pleasant to me.

The only way I can maintain my tanning routine. I HATE sleeping in tan & spending 8 hours during the day to have it on is unrealistic. I keep this on for 2-3 hours & I have never had a bad application. I use it once a week & it lasts...I have to scrub it off before a new application. Colour is perfect for fair skin & it also is great over natural colour in the summer. Iu2019ll never use anything else again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Within three hours of using this product, I have a deep, even tan that looks natural on my fair skin!   I have used less expensive brands of self tanner that gave me patchy, orange skin but I guess you get what you pay for!   Yes, this product is a little on the expensive side, but I got a lovely tan that lasted for days and then faded evenly.   Very impressed with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I get this product the mousse comes out green and I have to keep returning them until the mousse is brown(the color it should be). Very disappointing for the amount this product cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula. The color always comes out nice even if you just need a quick glow to not look like a ghost at a party.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to tanning product. I leave on for about 3.5hrs and it comes out perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tan looked great but did come out a little too orange for my light skin tone. It lasted a few weeks and overall it was even so Itu2019s a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this stuff! I am whiter than paper, like seriously, and this gives the most beautiful tan. I normally only leave on for 2 hours only because I found that if I left on for 3 hours or overnight, it was easier to see the places I missed (this is true for most tanners anyways). Not orange or streaky AT ALL. Normally lasts about a week, sometimes more, sometimes less just depends on how you prep and maintain your skin. I have gone through about 2 bottles already. Each bottle lasts a long time. If your new to self tanner I would buy the kit St. Tropez sells with the express tanner, mitt, lotion, etc. That's what got me hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much. Gives you a natural glowing tan. My go to tanning product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great fake tan - minimal smearing and patching. Best Iu2019ve tried so far. The mitt is crucial so invest in that too for sure. On my 4th bottle of this. Best in their line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm super disappointed this didn't work for me..  it turns me a bit orange.. after watching countless review videos I finally made the purchase and am surprised it turns me orange considering it's an olive base self tanner and there were so many good reviews on it.. well on the plus side it did dry fast and hardly any smell to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using St. Tropez for years, and switched to the Express about two years ago. Like the regular version, it gives you a natural looking tan that isn't orange. Overall I prefer this version for the ease of use. You wear it for a few hours, shower, and you're done. Just make sure to keep your skin moisturized, and to exfoliate before using.

reviews.review_title: Great tanner with OPTIONS in a single bottle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Oh yes yes yes yes yaaasss! Finally there is a self tanner that looks amazing on anyone! Especially for my very very fair skin! I leave it on for an hour for a subtle tan, 2 hours for a little more noticeable/medium tan, and 3 for a dark gorgeous glowing tan! My go to is 1-2 hours, honestly I usually leave it on for an hour an a half, give it a quick rinse, then leave it on for the rest of the 8 hours. By the end of the 8 hours I have a very gorgeous glow. Leaving it on for the different amounts of time does actually make a difference unlike some other brands. I love that there are options and that it still develops even after the first quick rinse! This is the best! It does give you a little bronze at first so you will see it for the first couple hours then you rinse it off QUICKLY donu2019t rinse forever, just enough to get a little off like seriously about 1-2 minutes then get out of the shower! Then go on and allow it to develop!  Quick tip: you can go on about your day for 8 hours but the tan does still develop so if you are wearing makeup it will not match at the end of the day so I recommend doing it at night then after you rinse go to bed to let it develop all night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color, easy to use, and faded evenly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great, natural look with olive undertones. It takes a while to perfect the art of putting it on your hands, elbows, knees, and feet, but once youu2019ve got that down, no one could guess your tan was from a bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a self tanning feen. This product is by far the best i've come across yet. It doesn't streak or come off patchy. The tan looks so natural unlike other tanners that leave you orange. It even perfectly tans the hands without getting weird dark knuckles or darkness inbetween the fingers! This is my go-to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best tanner Iu2019ve ever used. This does not leave me orange, and gives such a nice, natural, even deep bronze color after leaving on for 3- 3 1/2 hours. For reference, Iu2019m naturally very fair (Nars Mont Blanc), and this brings me to a deep medium (Nars Barcelona, which I then bronze even further with Laguna. Lol). Very happy to have found a self tanner that I donu2019t have to wallow in uncomfortably for eight hours. I apply in the evening with a mitt to clean shaven, exfoliated skin as directed. I leave on for three hours, or a little more if I forget, and then shower (directions say to do so without soap). You donu2019t see a result after the shower, and the guide color does very visibly wash down the drain, so I was skeptical at first. However, I wake up to a deep, natural looking tan, which for me is pretty amazing. Thrilled to have found something that works, without having to fry myself at a tanning bed or take time out of my day to spray tan. Highly recommend if youu2019re like me and hate sleeping in tanner, and have a little patience with the development of the tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After reading all the one and two star reviews, I was shocked that only one person commented on how sticky this stuff is. It is not fast drying at all. My skin felt tacky for hours, I only use this a few hours before bed and it transfers onto sheets and remains sticky and tacky until I wash it off in the morning. The color payoff is so so. Iu2019m a red head and fair. I love the concept of this and the smell doesnu2019t seems that bad, but then again, I live on tanning products. Would I purchase again? Nope.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m way too lazy to do a normal self tan process & this stuff makes it even easy enough for me. Iu2019ve left on for 5-6 hours and it still comes out nice. Definitely buy the applicator mitt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! Super easy to apply, no streaking and fades really evenly. Works so well I even use it in my face! I leave it in for 1 hour, rinse off and the next day it develops into a natural looking sunkissed glow! Works great with the St-Tropez mitt.

reviews.review_title: Love Classic, but Express is disappointing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of the St. Tropez Classic. The colour lasts a week, itu2019s not sticky but you have to sleep for 8 hours to get the full colour pay off. So I thought Iu2019d try the St. Tropez Express - which was a mistake. Itu2019s NOT quick drying, the smell is stronger and it lingers, the guide colour is basically non existent, and the colour lasts maybe 2 days at most. STICK TO THE CLASSIC - its worth the extra waiting for the colour to develop! So disappointed with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The tan comes out best over night , within an hour I see no change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail tanner. I think they recently changed the formula because this bottle made me way more tan than normal. As a result my hands were a mess. Small price to pay for a really dark tan. I have light skin and left this on for 2hrs and was medium-to dark (for me). I LOVE how you don't have to leave it on for 8hrs as other products prescribe as my skin is sensitive and even 2hrs is hard to sit through. This works fast and is super effective. My tan is on day 7 and going strong!

reviews.review_title: Secret to a beautiful glow all year round.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All my pale girls will appreciate this product. You can leave it on, and run around doing errands without worrying about it being wet or streaky. Really easy to apply. Evenly glow. Gotten compliments about how the natural glow in my skin. Definitely my little secret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many self tan products and this is, by far, my favorite. I love that I only have to wear it for three hours. Beautiful, even color every time. Smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best self Tanner I've ever used. Very natural looking and does not streak. Will be purchasing again!

reviews.review_title: Dont waste your time or money.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Buyer beware. If you're considering buying the St Tropez self tan express, just take your hard earned cash and light it on fire instead. You will experience the same result, regret and disappointment. Seriously, this stuff doesnt make even a slight difference, not even a shade. And even if it did make even the smallest change in skin tone, the formula basically turns y to clay once it touches the skin, and is impossible to spread. Just chunks of streaky paste basically everywhere. I've been self tanning for 10 years now, so no I'm not a rookie that cant follow directions. I had really high hopes for this stuff considering a higher price tag usually means better results, but no. The under $10 bottles from the corner store are significantly more efficient than this product. Top 5 worst purchases of my life. Get it together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually love this version better than the classic tan. The colour comes out so nice. Not wen a hint of orange for me & it fades off nicely. I found the classic tan faded out more patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The self tan express bronzing mousse has taken self-tanning to another level! I used to use the classic formula and loved it - but hated the length of time needed for it to work and the amount of sheets I ruined as a result! This express mousse gives me the same color I would get with the original formula however I only have to keep it on for 2 hours and then shower off! I even feel comfortable using this on my face as I know I can wash it off shortly after and won't cause me to breakout.  I typically apply this on a Friday afternoon and my tan will last throughout the entire weekend and into Monday. This is the perfect self-tanner for the summer (for people who don't tan that well naturally). Can't recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best self tanners, a little green but overall good color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is not bad and I really like the idea of being able to control how tan you are but for me even after 3 hours, I am not that tan. I am naturally quite pale so it doesn't take much to make me tan normally but this just isn't as dark as I would expect. On the plus side, it's very easy to apply and see where the color is because it goes on bronze. there is a tan smell but it's not overwhelming. not a bad option but not as good as isle of paradise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible! I needed an instant bronze before my friend's wedding and this product was a lifesaver. I am fair-skinned and have to say after leaving the bronzing mousse on for the maximum 3 hours (and then rinsing off) I my skin was noticeably darker. No streaks, fake-tan/orange color, and I have to say the bronze/tan does last several days. I would highly recommend exfoliating and moisturizing regularly, as this helps prolong the tan. I tend to do a couple of applications over a period of two or three days, but honestly, you can see results after one application. I highly recommend this product - buy the mitt, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self tanner ever!! Seriously

reviews.review_title: The self tanner of my dreams.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS!!! So much better than the original. It only takes three hours for full effect so I donu2019t have to sleep in it. It also doesnu2019t have as strong of a scent as the original or other brands.

reviews.review_title: goes on greenish, comes off looking like a goddess
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m going to be honest, Iu2019m very tall and I get at LEAST 20 tans out of this bottle. Thatu2019s like $2 a tan, and it looks as good if not better than a spray tan. Be sure to buy a mit (like, only buy it if youu2019re going to use a mit) but itu2019s truly a great product and lasts forever. More realistic fake tan Iu2019ve ever seen on both my friends of all skin tones and myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried many of the self tanners Sephora sells, and I always go back to this one. I hate having self tanner on or sleeping in it, so I like that I can leave this on for a couple hours and wash it off much quicker than other tanners.  I find that when I first wash it off I donu2019t see a lot of difference, but when I wake up the next day it looks much darker. I do find that the self tanner smell lingers into the next day even after you wash it off.  I use this on my face, and have had no breakouts or sensitivity. I apply the mousse with a tanning mit on my body. On my face and hands I use a foundation brush to buff it in and it looks so good with no weird cut off marks by my hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very natural looking color! Smelled like a self-tanner still, but it didnt transfer to clothes while wearing. It also fades very evenly, however it does only last about 4-5 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute go to sunless tanner. Iu2019ve been using it forever and every time I try something else it just doesnu2019t compare to this. I love that itu2019s 3 hours and I can shower. Def recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny! This could not be easier to use and the results are so natural looking. I have friends/relatives who have used the drugstore brand version and come out orange. I am very fair skinned and am not a major sun worshipper. Leaving this one for just an hour gives me the perfect light bronze glow I need to not look like Casper on vacation in the summer. Make sure you shave and exfoliate well before, moisturize (heavily on knees, elbows, ankles, wrists and face) to avoid patches, and use a brush to blend neck and other notoriously difficult areas to get even. I have done this once a week for the past month and have had no blotchiness or anything as it fades. I would put this on a subscription order.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for that busy girl who wants to be tan!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dark but not orange. Love the speed of this tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what happened to this product but itu2019s not what it used to be. I purchased a bottle recently and I tried twice to make it work to no avail. After 1 day it was wearing off in huge spots, for example the side of my knee had no color while the rest of my leg was fine. Iu2019m extremely diligent with moisturizing and donu2019t have this issue with other tanning products. Iu2019m sad about this product but itu2019s time to move on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and this gives me beautiful, natural color.  I've always used liquid self-tanners, but I'm loving the Mousse formulation and used with the mitt, the application is easy and flawless.  The built-in bronzer definitely transfers to sheets though so if you're applying this before bed be aware.  Washes out easily, but I switched to daytime application so that I could shower before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m super fair skinned and this didnu2019t tan me AT ALL! After putting it on and waiting 2 hours, it looked pretty dark. However, as soon as I went into the shower, I watched all of the color go down the drain. (I tried this product twice and this happened both times! The first time I only waited for one hour though) Iu2019m going to try this again, for the third time, and wait 3 hours to see if I get any sort of a tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a great olive tone, but that is the only pro. It is very patchy and even worst broke me out badly. I kept getting acne on my chest which I never do, then my sister tried it out and the exact same thing happened to her. The acne stayed around forever !!! Iu2019ve been using self tanners for YEARS and never had this problem!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: No smell initially but after a while it smells. Not too strong  a smell but it does have that tanning smell that lasts for about a day or 2. Application with mitt makes it easy but do it on a hard surface as the mousse drips from the lip of the opening after pumping some out. No streaks, but then no big difference in colour after 3 hours. Will prob have to to use more than once a week to get more of a colour payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the best BY FAR self-tanner that I've ever tried. I've tried lotions, in shower stuff, etc and nothing compares to this one. my fluorescent white, glow in the dark skin doesn't look orange and it's very easy to apply and the color guard really helps with getting flawless all over coverage. it's a little sticky afterward but it's not terrible and the smell isn't as bad as self-tanners usually are. I left it on for about an hour and a half and it was the perfect amount of time for my Casper white skin. I don't look sick anymore!! highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am normally the lightest foundation shade in foundations, I leave this on for 1.5 hours and it looks so pretty and natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You have got to use a mitt with this.  I'm going to say that up front.  It's non-negotiable.  But if you use a mitt, and you take your time, you will be really happy with the results.  I am extremely pale (my foundation shade is Nars Siberia....) but I wanted a little color on my legs so I wouldn't feel like I was blindingly white at the pool.  I applied some plain lotion to my feet, ankles and knees, let it sit about twenty minutes, then spent maybe ten minutes very carefully applying the mousse in smallish amounts, making sure to really work it into the skin and to smooth out any places that looked streaky.  Then I sat on my couch (on a towel) for about an hour and a half before rinsing it off.  You can leave it on up to three hours, but I was just looking to take the edge off as opposed to getting a full tan.  The next morning I woke up and was VERY happy with how it turned out.  It's a very natural, even color.  I only had one or two small places where it looked a little too dark or patchy and they were easy to smooth out with a little toner on a cotton pad.  I remember how awful self tan products were in the 90s, and cannot believe how much easier they are to use now.  I plan on using this all summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product. I've used numerous self tanning products and this is by far my favorite. I do think it can be tacky on your skin at times until it dries but its worth the color in a short amount of time. The only downside about buing from Sephora with the Flash subscription is that it didn't come with a mitt and with other sites that have the 2 day shipping, for the same price, it came with a mitt. Aside from that, I highly suggest this product and will still be buying it from Sephora again (the free samples are always a plus too!). One tip with this product, exfoliate and moisturize natural dry spots (elbows, ankles, hands, wrists) before applying and if use a baby wipe or make up wipe to clean off nails and palms of hands after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed in this product. It leave a sticky feeling on your skin until you wash it off, transfers onto clothes your wearing and barely lasts 2 days. the color you get is nice but doesnu2019t last and it fades awful!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice, natural looking tan. Make sure to use a mitt and blend more than you think you need to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really great. You can apply it carelessly and still come away with a nice natural tan. If it gets on anything like clothes, sheets or wall/floor, it washes off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried it several times and I only get colour when I do two coats and leave it on over night. If you want a dark tan anticipate that. I tried lots of times doing one coat and leaving it for 3-4 hours and it would leave me one shade darker than my normal skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What a great product! I'm seriously super impressed. I always hate when people use sunless tanning products that make them look like they rolled in a bag of Doritos! If you want a product that doesn't have the Dorito effect then buy this! I would recommend using the application mitt but that's it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best self tan so far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find this to be super patchy no matter how i use it, I always have huge blotches around my hands, inside my arms where your arms would naturally touch together and overall i look super scaly when i wear this. super disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Great on pale skin, easy to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very pale and most self-tanners are orange and streaky on me. This product is like the holy grail of sunless tanning for me. I originally bought the starter kit and am now buying full size. It looks like a very natural color and except for reaching your back (lol) it's very easy to apply evenly! I left it on for an hour and a half and had a natural-looking glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! So fool proof, easy to use and never ever leaves that orange dorito dust look ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting tan that goes on streak free. I leave it on from 2-3 as the directions instructed and the results last at least 5 days. I also suggest getting the ST Tropez mitt, works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and color. I went with only hour and half first application and a few days later did second application to get the right color. Better safe than sorry...It was perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time self tanner here! Loved the color and longevity of this tanner. Definitely did my research before purchasing and was not disappointed. The only reason it was missing a star for me is that I had exfoliated about two days after as I usually do while showering and I had some bumps all over my arms and legs. This was most likely due to the tanner and friction Iu2019m assuming. I wouldnu2019t exfoliate legs and arms till maybe a couple days after you use this just go over with soap and water. Other than that it was great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many tanning products but this never fails to amaze me. So easy, beyond easy to apply. I wash the night after each use just to avoid streaks. This product is so natural. I'm normally the lightest shade in foundation (snow in born this way), with this I'm about 5 shades darker but it looks so natural, no one knows it's fake. My scars and imperfections look less noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this earlier today and of course I was dying to try it. I waited 2 hrs and Iu2019m a ginger so Iu2019m so pale I reflect sun light lol. The color looks great and even no blotch marks so far after rinse off. And it says it gets darker during an 8 hr period after rinse off for a longer tan. So I  canu2019t wait to see what it looks like in the end because so far I look ready for splash house!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Far too streaky and a nightmare to get off! It goes patchy and you need a few days scrubbing before it goes away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, provides great color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair and Freckly skin, and this had been the only self tanner I trust. Love the this express tan the most so I donu2019t have to worry about sleeping in tanner or sweating. keep it on for 30mins to 3 hours depending how dark or how much time before a date then wash off and pat dry!  goes on evenly and is not smelly. Recommend to use with a tanning mit and apply in circular motion. Watch at Tropez applying Video! It helps

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I use it when I want to be tan for a special event, and its sooo much better than a spray tan. The color looks real. Best part is you can kind of choose how dark you want to be based on how long you leave it on for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, just wish it didn't have the guide color that transfers. Realistic tan. Best brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Iu2019ve tried multiple self tanning methods including getting an actual airbrush tan and I have to admit the color of this product is the best! Itu2019s a very good bronze color thatu2019s more natural looking and not that orang or pink undertone.  I also like this one bc you can adjust by how long you wear before showering off. I also brush a little near my hairline/forehead to give more beach tan look :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for the last couple of years and I love it! I get so many compliments on my tan and one coat does the trick for me if I'm in a hurry. I normally sleep in mine and wash off in the morning. I do recommend putting this on with a mitt, as I would with any tanning mousse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This tanner is great! The color is fantastic and the tan lasts a long time. It isn't a huge difference in color after a few days but if you keep building it up it looks great. There is not a bad scent to it at all which I love. Not a huge fan of having to shower off the tanner but that's how a lot of them work. Also only having to wait 3 hours as opposed to 4-6 like other tanners is a huge plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The more I try other tanning products, the more I appreciate this stuff. Works quickly and actually TANS the skin. Still smells like tanner and requires minimum 3 hours to develop, but far better than 8  hours for a horrible excuse of a tan. Will continue purchasing until I find something better.

reviews.review_title: Highly recommend for a gorgeous tan!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this tanner! this is my first time using a self tanner and this product made it so easy! not orange at all, it gives a beautiful natural looking tan. It is so easy to apply too and does not streak! love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: im not the best at applying fake tanners, yet no matter how badly i apply this it looks great and does not look patchy! I'm usually the lightest shade in foundations and leave this on for four hours (they only recommend 1-3 hours) and it looks GREAT and not orange at all. has a very natural look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying that I am a tan girl to start. Being half Cuban I already have a tan complexion but I still love to have a little tan or glow. This is the first sunless tanner I have tried but I did really like it. Itu2019s so easy to apply. I watched a video on the best methods and used a mitt. I never had any streaks or unevenness. Super easy. I did not think that it smelled bad at all but my husband thinks it is so strong and hates it. As far as the color and effectiveness I am ehh feeling about it. I think it does give me a slight glow but I definitely wouldnu2019t say it made me dark or tan. I will still use it bc I think it evens my skin tone especially on my stomach and chest and I like the glow but I will try the dark next. It would probably work great on lighter tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best self tan I have ever gotten, I have tried Loving Tan in the past and I turned pure orange. I have olive undertones and this definitely compliments anyone who does. I get so many compliments and would rebuy again and again. This is better color than the original St. Tropez in the white bottle because you can control the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve gone through several bottles of this and I love it. Itu2019s easy to apply and gives the most beautiful, natural looking bronzed tan. I am extremely white and this product makes me look like Iu2019ve just spent a month on a yacht. Itu2019s amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. This works so well for me and fades beautifully. I love that it doesn't dry me out as much as other self tanners. If you want it super dark just leave it on over night. Soooo natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like a lot of reviews say, I've tried sooo many self tanners out there and this is definitely one of the best! My only qualms with this is that it still has a tanning scent as it develops and it does start to get blotchy as it wears off. I'd say it lasts for about a week (maybe a little less) before you'd need to reapply. I have found that I need to scrub it off completely before reapplying another application as that increases the blotchy factor. But it does give you a gorgeous color and develops quickly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foam tanner. Very easy to apply (I suggest purchasing the kit as well). No streaks as long as you apply correctly. Leaves me tan for days (3-4). Smells great too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite sunless tanner.  Since it is a max 3 hours wait time, it is quick as well.  Much better than waiting overnight with it on and ruining sheets. I always use this Express foam with the mitt, put a lotion on my hands, knees, elbows, and feet to protect them from turning orange or discolored.  I leave on for 2-3 hours, And the results are always great.  I put this on my face as well. However, I uslually do my face last and just use whatever product is left on the mitt (same for my hands/feet).  The only negative is the St Tropez Mitts that I buy to use with it. The mitts do kinda fall apart after 2 uses. It may be the way I am straining to reach my mid back area. But they get little holes that turn into huge holes pretty quickly.  I just use them anyway and work awkwardly around it.   The actual tanning foam Product itself is awesome!  Using a loofah everyday in the shower usually keeps my skin exfoliated enough for when I apply the foam.  So although it recommends exfoliating prior to use.... if you are like me and use a loofah and put a little moisturizer on your knees, elbows, hands, feet, and sometimes my neck.  You should be good to go without a hardcore exfoliating process first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried multiple self tanning products and this one is by far the best one!!!! First time I used it, I went to a party and a stranger asked me if I has just gotten back from vaca or if I go tanning in the salon because my tan looked so good!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If applied with the mitt you truly won't see streaky results. In my personal experience the color is very natural and not orange. Lasts for roughly one week ...then you have an awkward (only to you) 3 days as it's coming off. I've used this product several times a month for a year and won't be stopping any time soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect summer glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I included the picture because I wash in a rush to go out and forgot to tan my hands but I wanted to show the difference in color. I would rather buy something pricey and have it work! Have literally tried every sunless tanner out there and this is awesome! Does not streak and gives you a deep color not orange at all. Another good alternative if you want a product that has more organic ingredients is Beauty By Earth tanner. But this one is awesome to use you get a deep color truly within three hours. I washed it off the next day and felt so clean tan and fresh.

reviews.review_title: Tan express I love you so much!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Because of this weird vacation ruining reaction I get after longer exposure to sun, tanning is out of the question for me. And because of my light complexion, any sort of beach vacation becomes a struggle of will.  Tan and suffer or stay pale and envious of everyone else's tan. Enter self tanners...I tried them all including professional airbrushing which was my go-to before I discovered this product.
