My biggest challenge was that, I think because of that skin condition, none of them could get me to that deeper a week in the tropics level. Even airbrushing, no matter how deep of a color I selected, after the first shower I was left with just a bronzed glow. But not this guy.   Now, I actually don't follow the instructions and keep it on overnight. I would not recommend that if you have a skin that tans normally. But if you struggle with getting a deeper tan, that will do it.  This leaves me with a beautiful naturally looking deep color. However my husband (who also became a fan) can achieve the same result by leaving it on for only 2-3 hours.  So this might take a little testing before you find your right level/timing.  Other positives are that it goes on pretty evenly and doesn't have excessive self tanner smell, although there is some but it usually dissipates within a day. It also doesn't dry out my skin as much as some of the other tanners do.  Few pointers, this product sets fast so I would suggest applying it onto one section and working it in before moving onto the next one. Also, I'd skip the application mitt. Honestly it feels like you're wasting a ton of product that gets soaked up into it and by the time you are 3/4 of the way done it's soaked through and staining your hand.  I just lotion my hands with a thick lotion or coconut oil, leave on for few minutes then rinse with warm water, dry and start applying. It works great and I never had a problem with my hands being stained.  To sum up, if you're tan challenged like me, you need to try this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for years- I have actually never tried anything else.  Using the mitt helps spread the product evenly (and to help from staining!) Exfoliating before and moisturizing dry areas (elbows, knees, ankles) helps immensely.  Even though this is the express version- I still leave it on for 3-4 hours, as I prefer a darker tan.  It also helps to know that you MUST not sweat/get wet while the product is doing it's thing- you will end up blotchy. I typically have this issue on my chest so I make sure I am hanging around the house for a few hours while the product sets in.  Once you shower it off, you're good to glow. (Pun intended) I typically use this once a week to keep it maintained.  10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so badly.... I have tried every brand out there and fake bake is my go to which I love but the thought of tanning in a quick 4 hours was appealing... I tried this product 3 times because I thought maybe I didnu2019t put enough on or maybe I didnu2019t exfoliate enough but Iu2019m really sad to report this product did not have the color pay off I was hoping for... I am medium based skin (pale this time of year) and I barely got a tanu2014 I left it on over night, for 6 hours, waited for it to develop after and still not impressed. It dries quickly and I donu2019t mind the smell so I really wish they offered a darker option. I tried doing it two days in a row to see if that would help darken the color and it did but it negates the whole 4 hour appeal ... it fades nicely in some areas it was a little splotchy when it started to come off but it lasted for almost a week which is impressive compared to my fake bake but overall this product to me wasnu2019t worth the money for u201cso sou201d color. If I self tan I wanna look tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best bronzer I've ever used. easy application, amazing color and it doesn't have orange undertones.  You can apply when getting ready and then go about your day as long as you can avoid water. it also has a pleasant smell, as far as tanners go. Definitely my ride or die

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works so well with my natural, very pale skin tone. Fades unevenly though.

reviews.review_title: It does not remove at all in a uniform way!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is easy to apply and really darkens the color of the skin BUT it does not remove at all in a uniform way, it makes orange traces in some places and when I put on my sports armband it removes all the self-tanner in below: what leaves me with a trace of white armband .. For the price it's really disappointing
I used this and waited an hour to shower and now my tan is completely gone, I have pretty fair skin and I'm hoping it develops by tomorrow morning. Did this happen to anyone else?

reviews.review_title: best self tanner I have ever used hands down
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this self tanner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I've ever tried to self tan and I can say I'm SO impressed. I used the St. Tropez applicator mitt and I had no issues applying it. It was super easy to blend, and as long as you're exfoliating (and moisturizing the trouble areas) before it will come out evenly. I generally have fair skin, even in the summer, however this product left me with such a natural looking glow. I left it on for just under two hours - when I washed it off it appeared a little lighter than I had hoped, but by the morning it had darkened (and it wasn't even orange, YAY). I'm now on day three of having a beautiful, natural colour.

Wow, I was not expecting this to really give good color after 3 hours, but it really does. I always leave it on overnight and then rinse it off in the morning and my tan comes out so perfectly. One time, I put a second layer of tan after a few hours and I was shocked at how dark it got. I have some spots of tinea versicolor that won't tan at all, so I make sure I scrub my skin thoroughly and use an anti-fungal and anti-bacterial wash in the shower and that usually takes care of that and then I can properly tan over top of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can't live without it, It gives such a natural tan and also last for about a week. Only thing I would say though is to make sure to exfoliate before hand or you will get a lot of patchy areas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you don't want to go and get a professional spray tan, this is THEEEEE best self tanner out there!! I have used many other brands, but they do not compare to St. Tropez. Worth the price, and definitely lives up to the hype. I love this specific formula because I only need to leave it on for 2-3 hours, wash off, and I have a beautiful deep tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I needed to get a quick tan that didn't look fake and I've used this brand in the past. Love this product!  Quick. Easy. No streaks. Came back from vacation looking like I was poolside the entire time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product the first time I used it. I washed it off after 2 hours and it was a beautiful natural tan. But then after about a week and a half I wanted a darker tan so I put it on and washed it off after 3 hours. It made me orange and it was patchy as it was coming off. It didn't even fade i litterally had to scrub it off because it was so patchy. I was very sad but maybe I did something wrong and I will probably try it out again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great color just wish it lasted a little longer and dried a little quicker. It's still my go to sunless tanner, even though it's no completely perfect. I have tried just about every beauty store brand and a couple drugstore brands and this is my favorite because it's express! I'm tan in 1-3 hours depending how long I leave it on. I hate sleeping in sunless tanner because of the smell and how hot it makes me. I can apply this whenever I want and it doesn't smell bad at all (unless you sleep in it).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried them all and this is THE BEST.  It is quick and easy to apply with the mitt.  Gives me a nice even, natural look with minimal effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. My husband has always complained of self tanner smell when I've used other brands. But now he never says anything with this stuff. And I barely notice a smell. Leaves a beautiful tan after 3 hours. I love this stuff! I suggest washing hands and feet after a hour so they don't get so dark. So easy to apply. No streaks.

I've never had so many compliments on my skin. I look in the mirror and feel so gorgeous and refreshed. I've never used self tanner before and wish I'd started sooner because let me tell you there's nothing better than putting on some St. Tropez then laying down in the air conditioning to watch some Netflix, but look like you spent hours baking in the sun! Gorgeous product. Fabulous!

I applied this at night, left it on for 2 hours, rinsed off and went to bed. I woke up to the most beautiful tan! I very pale but this tan looks really natural and not orange. Tips - Buy the mitt  -Start from bottom up -Apply to feet and hands LAST using the remaining product left on the mitt (don't add another pump for hands and feet!)

reviews.review_title: The best self tanner I have ever used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this tanner! I have normal skin that is not easily irritated and all I do is exfoliate, shave and apply the mouse with the mitt. I use this product at least once a week, usually waiting an hour before rinsing off -- two hours if I am going for a dark fresh from the beach tan. Tan has always looked extremely natural and when I have let it fade away it has never been obvious.
This is the easiest self tan I have ever used and the color is so natural. I exfoliate and shave and then I apply it everywhere with the st. Tropez mit and it's fantastic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blown away by this product. I actually get to be tan for once!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use all the St. tropez products year round. They are the BEST. Don't waste your money on any other brand. Most natural color. This one product in particular is very easy to use. I shower and exfoliate and then use my mit to apply the foam. It looks a little greenish when applied, but don't be afraid it washes off and leaves a golden tan behind. I leave this on for an hour and a half while i am getting ready in the morning or before bed. I rise off in the shower with soap and that's it. If u r very pale an hour will give u a nice golden glow. If u r looking for something dramatic leave on for 2 hours. Very easy to use.

I have tried so many self tanners and I think this is by far my favorite. I have very pale skin and this gives me a nice color. Make sure you use the mitt! Other self tanners left me streaky around my feet but this one doesn't. I also leave it on overnight too and it works pretty quickly. It doesn't have a bad odor either and dries pretty quickly.

I have olive skin and I prefer I nice dark tan. I used to go with Loving Tan, but I found I had trouble blending it into my ankles, feet, hands and elbows. It was a great dark tan, but you could tell I had tanner on.   This one did not give me a dark tan. But it did give me a nice natural tan. Definitely a few shades darker than my natural color. I'm going to try and build it up over the next couple of days for a wedding.   I took the mitt and applied on all parts of my body except my hands and feet. For those I used a kabuki brush with a small amount of product and worked it in. There are NO streaks, patchiness, or any indication that I have tanner on. It dried pretty quickly upon application. Only after the 4-5 hour mark I started to a smell a little (not bad). Overall this is great. Hopefully I can build it up more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used many self tanners before and the colour  of this one is awful. It also dries very streaky. I would pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the regular mousse for the past 3 years and decided to try this one. I have light skin and leave this on for 3 hours to get a very subtle tan (usually 2 pumps per arm and leg). I then tried doing this 3 days in a row for 3 hours each and get a really nice tan. This mousse does not last as long as the original formula and I think that is doesn't fade as well. The tans lasts around 3 days before the fading starts. It doesn't smell bad, but after rinsing the mousse off after 3 hours the fake tan smell is definitely there. After I take a real shower with soap the smell disappears. I like the color this mousse gives so I can see myself repurchasing this in the future.

I kept ot on for an hour and half and it gave me a nice glow. I'm very pale, so I guess I expected a little more. I'll keep it on for 3 hrs next time. Also it SMELLS. There is no denying it. It smells exactly like those cheap gradual tanners you buy at the pharmacy and the smell lasts days.. I showered twice and can still smell it. I used the mit but it still ended up being a little patchy... I think that might be my fault though because I don't have a full length mirror in my bathroom. Also it's a little orangey, I was hoping it would be more of an olive tone. My hands looks especially orange even though I followed the directions for my hands perfectly.  Overall it worked. It's not the best, but it did work. I'll definitely finish my bottle but I might switch to a different brand to find one that suits my needs a little more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the best beauty purchase I have ever made! I will be repurchasing this product for the rest of my life. The color is identical to what my natural tanning color looks like. Thank you soo much for making this self-tanner. When I first wore this tanner in front of my husband, he couldn't stop staring at me. When I asked why he was staring at me, he said that it was because I looked super beautiful and he thought to himself oh my god I have the most beautiful wife!

I am pretty pale & have very sensitive skin. A lot of self tanners irritate my skin , break me out or just look so orange and unnatural on my very white skin! I'm 21 and have really started taking care of my skin, and that means watching my sun exposure! I went for it and bought this. The guard is beautiful and so natural , it blends like a dream and I wasn't streaky at all! The smell wasn't intense, it wasn't sticky and it just looked so natural ! I'm so obsessed with this tanner! I hate sleeping in self tanners so I bought this because I wanted to wash it off before bed. But the only downside {why I gave it 4 stars} is that it pretty much came off after day 3 lol it's not cheap so I was hoping it would last 5 days at least. But , it's still amazing !

I've spent half my life looking for a self tanner that doesn't smell, is easy to apply and delivers. I actually scored this at TJ Max for $8.99 (sealed and with mitt) and I will gladly shell out $44 for this. LOVE. Hardly any smell and perfect golden color.

This stuff does not feel sticky. I can put it on in the morning before work and wear clothes over it. It gets me very dark and works best when using the st tropez polish in the shower beforehand. Since it is tinted it also gives me instant color. Right now I use it once a week but it's nice that if i miss doing it and the weekend comes I can always use it right before I go it and you literally have a tan in an hour. It's a great self tanner for lazy people that don't always plan ahead. The smell is fine too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, I used it together with a mitt and the result is amazing. I can't stop looking at my arms and legs.

love this product! went on easily and left a nice brown tan. not orange at all. this is my fourth day with it on and i still look pretty tan. did not leave me with that typical self tan smell after i washed off as most do. its a little expensive but so far it seams to be worth it.
I refer the original St.Tropez the classic tanning or the express. This one leaves streaks.

I'm an NW 15 in Mac, so I'm a) SUPER PALE and b) PINK undertoned, so you could say that self tanners and I have not always gotten along. Every single self tanner I have ever tried has made me look  orange or super olive, and for someone who is pink-undertoned, olive doesn't look natural. I don't know how this stuff does it, but it tans me while keeping my pink undertones to give me a natural tan! It's wonderful. I'll never try anything else. No streaking, easy to apply (seriously if I can use it, you can use it), and the smell isn't horrible (the tanner smell is definitely there, but if you apply it before bed it fades by the time you wake up). Will repurchase for the summer months!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this for all special events I go to, as I am very light skinned and do not tan well. I love this stuff! It is a natural bronze and NEVER streaks, even when Im in a rush and put little effort it still comes out amazing. I leave mine on for an hour for day events, and an hour and a half for night events. Buy the mitt and follow the directions and you will have the perfect tan.

I was excited to try this and decided to do a test run before next weekend. I lightly layered it on my skin once and stayed for 1.5 hours; although everything seemed nice at first, I wake up the next morning looking like an orange. I'm naturally pale with a neutral/warm undertone so just be careful if that sounds like you. Very thankful I didn't do the full 3 hours lol

I purchased this based on the reputation of the brand. The 1 hour express really appealed to me, because time is always of the essence! The application with the mitt is so easy! Depending on how dark you want to be, wait 1-3 hours and rinse off. First time I tried I did about an hour an a half, and the color was great! No streaks, does have the spray tan smell, but they all do. Looks great!

I have used this and the original mousse for YEARS. It has been my absolute favorite self tanner. Everywhere I'd go, someone would compliment me on how natural it looked. Application was always easy, absolutely no streaking... until now. I feel like St Tropez has done something with the formula. It now streaks and fades unevenly in spots. I've bought 2 bottles from 2 different places over the past 6 mos and they've both done the same. It also seems to have a more orangy tone to it.

I've been using this brand of self tanner for years now. I used to go apply the St. Tropez Dark mousse before bed and shower in the AM. I still do that time to time with this product but I like the convenience of being able to put it on, let it sit for a few hours, and still have a dark tan. It does last! I'd say the first 3-4 it looks amazing and then starts to fade. It is still a little sticky which I have yet to find a self tanner that isn't sticky at all. This is still hands down my favorite product, I use it all year round, every two weeks. Must have for me!

I have tried quite a few self tanners over the years. This one is by far my favorite.  I have light skin color and I saw a nice difference in the developed results.  I did one leg as a test and let it develop for about 6 hrs.  I had fallen asleep. When I washed it off I had a shade darker tan, nothing extreme. I wouldn't say the product works like a spray tan would but it definitely made a nice difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've done this twice and my skin is orangey. I almost look sunburnt. The smell is okay at first but I can smell the self-tanner smell later in the day, not a fan of that. I really don't have any luck with self tanners, it must be my skin type.  I usually tan quickly but was trying to get ahead start. There is nothing like the sun.

I use this all the time and it's a super natural looking tan. It doesn't have a super bad fake tanner smell and if you apply with the mitt, it's not streaky at all. I usually leave this on for around 2 hours because I'm always scared that any more time would make me look orange. I'm naturally fair to light with yellow underlines and self tanner always makes my skin look yellower than it is. Im writing this review because the other day I accidentally fell asleep with this on for 6 hours. When I woke up I was insanely panicked and ran to the bathroom immediately to rinse it off. To my surprise, the developed product was not orangey at all but a beautiful, medium dark tan. It's much much darker than what I would usually go for and I would probably never try that again, but it's good to know that no matter how much you overdo it with this product, it'll always look natural. I love this and I highly recommend it for self tanning newbies and veterans alike!

reviews.review_title: For all the pale folk out there
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so pale I've been mistaken for a ghost on several occasion, SO pale that often the lightest shade of make up is by far too dark. This baby is a lifeeee saver - a natural shade of tan, olive based and soooo easy to use. I left it on for just under two hours, which I suggest to start off with cause 1 hour isn't enough but I'm not adventurous enough to go past the 2 hour mark. Expensive but worth it! Using a bronzing mitt, don't forget to exfoliate & moisturize etc etc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A natural healthy glow, that gets better each day. Was a little skeptical at first considering it's I haven't had much luck with at home tanning treatments, but this one is different; primarily because of the formula which is mousse-y and light and it makes a difference. By applying it with the glove, you get an even application with no streaks. Great product, highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite self tanner ever! It seriously look so natural that sometimes I'm convinced it's an actual tan and it's not from using this. It comes out of the bottle looking green so it has more of an olive finish and not an orange look. It doesn't smell and it doesn't stain at all. I am seriously obsessed! One of the best purchases from Sephora.

I applied this and left it on for 3 hours- nada. I'm a redhead, with truly pale skin, and my skin did not change color at all. I've used several tanning mousses in the past so I'm well versed on how to apply it. Absolutely returning.

So first thing i want to say is, to the people who are saying they are fair skinned and this didn't work for them must not actually be that fair. I used this just on my legs to test it out first and left it on for an hour. Washed it off and i was noticeably a shade darker. When i woke up the next morning i'd say i was about 2 shades darker, so it when it says it keeps working it does. I am a redhead with VERY fair skin and this worked perfect for me!
Made me kind of orange, I prefer the vita liberata tanning mousse to get a more olive-y colour.

This is by far the best at home tan! I love this new formula and it works great if you're in need of a quick, easy, and gorgeous tan! It last for a solid week if you maintain with your moisturizer. The smell is so much better than most and looks very natural. Skip those dangerous tanning beds and get this amazing healthy alternative!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gives me the perfect colour, always get compliments when i use it, it's definitely become a beauty secret. lasts for a couple of days, streak free, applies evenly with the mitten.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a fan of spray tans, but I wanted to try an at-home tanner to avoid going to the salon.   This product seemed like everyone's holy grail. I heard so many great things about it.   So, I went to Sephora to check it out and buy it. I decided to smell it before buying it.   Guys- the smell was SO bad I almost gagged. I obviously decided not to purchase this product because I would never be able to put something so terrible smelling on my body.   I wasn't motivated to smell any other products from this brand because I was so turned off.
I still swear by the original 8 hour foam but if you're in a rush this stuff is great too!

reviews.review_title: Used to be my Holy Grail
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. The color was perfect for my pale skin-but I just repurchased and it seems the fragrance has changed. It's an overpowering rose scent that is reminiscent of bad perfume in church. Id rather smell dihydroxyacetone than this- i may actually need to return it.

I love this tanner because it only takes 3 hours to develop a perfect sun kissed tan. I'm fair skinned and it doesn't leave this orange looking color, it's a perfect shade. As for application I've been using this product for 2 years it took me some time to perfect the application but once mastered completely streak free, and natural looking. I recommend using their mit.  It's my go to year round, I don't use anything else. I reapply every 3 days to maintain an even color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use many different self tan products and found that this one didn't give me any results. First I left on for three hours and washed off and didn't notice anything so the next night I left it on overnight and still very little color. Very disappointed.

This is a green sort of based tanner so it gives you a nice natural tan without looking orange. I love how easily it applies and it's not streaky! This is the only tanner I've tried. I only wish it would last longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite self-tanner for when I need to get a quick fake tan. The color makes it so my skin doesn't look orange and it doesn't have a strong odor like most of the other tanners.

reviews.review_title: my one and only HG self tanner
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many different brands through the years, including all of those Australian brands that you have to order especially and wait forever for. No matter what, this mousse remains the one I keep going back to. No streaking, no quick fade, no bad smells, no sensitivity (and I get rashes from EVERYTHING), no transfer, no stickiness, no blotches, and no issues. Legit. I just keep buying more and more and using this. All the other brands suck imo. And this is the best product for this brand. I often leave it on for about eight hours to get that I've had a day at the beach/just got back from vacation look, and it's perfect. It's also perfect for short term, so even if I don't have time but I need color quickly I would apply it about 2 to three hours before a shower and get a great tan

I found after washing it off after the recommended 3 hours for a dark tan that I really wasn't even tan and I'm very fair to begin with. I've tried putting it on before bed and leaving it on for 8  hours still with the same results. I'm not sure if I got a bad bottle but I've used other more inexpensive self tanners before with better results, I'm just not sure it's worth the cost
Very nice self tanner. Doesn't stain sheets/clothing. Natural looking color and doesn't make my face break out. This is safe to use on your face! Zero pore clogging ingredients.
gives a natural looking tan every time!! you get tons of uses out of the bottle- well worth the splurge!!

It's greatest value is that of a self tanner I can wash off within mere hours. Nothing else I've tried is both effective and fast. The colors is perfect for my yellow undertones pale skin, though I often wait the full three (or more!) hours.
Best self tanner I've tried- goes on really light and dries quickly but gives plenty of color.  Best of all its very difficult for this to look streaky! Its amazing.
Seriously so easy to rub in. No streaking. It came with a free applicator mitt. Right away it gave me a glow. And I like that you can control how dark you get! So worth it

Idk if maybe they changed the formula but it barely tanned me at all. I left it on for 3 hours to get the very dark tan but instead it made me orange. Will be returning it unfortunately, I've used it in the past but it just seen totally different to me :(

I've used a St. Tropez tanning product before -- the one that is left on for about four hours or so and I like it. I tried the Express Mousse recently and I like it even more. It requires only three hours for the maximum effect, and I have found it to be a very natural color on my skin. (I do need to be careful to exfoliate my heels so that I don't get too dark a color.) I sometimes reapply it a few days later for an even deeper tan. The smell is noticeable when first applied but not overwhelming. I find that when I shower after the prescribed time and apply lotion, the odor is gone. I will continue to use this product. (I also recommended it to my daughter who has my same skin tone, which is medium.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am VERY fair and this goes on easily. The smell isn't overwhelming and the color lasts through about three showers. I will continue to keep this as a staple. The color is very natural. The only issue would be it does leave your skin slightly sticky for about 20-30 minutes after application.

This product is a very good product. It was the first self tanner I have ever tried and my skin is very pale so I was too scared to buy the dark version of this tanner. What I would like people to know before they get upset with they judge this product is that it is for light-tan skin tones. Having olive-dark skin and using this product won't work very well. The tanner should be left on for about 4 hours and you will get a sunkissed glow. I like to do it every other day to build up how dark I want it to be. I only gave it 4 stars because the smell it leaves on your skin after isnt too pleasant. Also, I have not tried many self tanners so I am not sure if there is a product much better than this one. Overall, it is a great self tanner and lasts long.
Ok so yes I like this product. I am naturally an olive tone complexion & with this tanner it does not make me any tanner... Like I've left it on for 4 hours and it's done nothing to me.

Seeing as I have got to be one of the whitest people in Oregon, I've tried more than my fair share of self tanners. St. Tropez is definitely the brand I love the most. I only leave this on for one hour but I look so naturally glowing, it's perfect. I use it in conjunction with the in shower tanner and it gives me a perfect brown glow. It seems like they changed the scent, and it is a little strong, but I'd take perfumey smells over self tanner smells any day.  Honestly, this is a must have for everybody.

reviews.review_title: BEST SELF TANNER ON THE MARKET
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will NEVER try any other self-tanner or tanning bed AGAIN! I workout every single day, and with spray tans from the tanning salon, they would RUB OFF where my sports bra rubbed against my skin, so I would remove my clothes and see the outline of my bra! The outline would be pale and the rest of me would be some sort of orangey-tan.. THIS STUFF is a game changer. I leave it on for three hours, rinse it off and NEVER have to worry about it rubbing off being, being blotchy, and it fades nicely and evenly. PLEASE do not pass this up! I recommend this to everyone. I use it on my face also, so I don't have to throw make up on, and it has never made my sensitive skin break out! It does wear off on the face a LITTLE bit quicker, but thats because I rub my face with cleansers and masks everyday lol. AND you can exfoliate your skin with this on and the tan doesn't come off! You will fall in love with this! Just purchased my second bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The ability to control the amount of color is so convenient

reviews.review_title: Finally found my go-to self tanner!!
reviews.review_text: I have tried almost 10-15 self tanners and avoided St. Tropez because of the cost, but Honey it is worth it! Streak free, super beautiful color, easy to apply, and you don't have to use much product to get a glowing tan. Showers off really easy too. Only suggestion would be to use a mit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Glides on smooth and with no streaking. Left it on 3 hours for the dark tan and it lasted almost a week. Definitely recommend this product.

I really like this tanner for a few reasons: 1. It's fast. The fastest color I've gotten. 2. It's a natural color. It blends well with my very pale skin tone and gives me a nice flow. 3. It lasts probably 3 days with exfoliation and doesn't get patchy.   A couple things I am not crazy about: 1. Four hours (or even two) is still a long time to let myself sit and not really go out anywhere or get my hands wet or sweat. I tried sleeping in it but it comes off on my sheets. 2. It still does come off on the sheets a few days later. It does wash off though.

I've been using this product for years after a friend recommended it to me. I'm very fair and this product rarely streaks. Only when I apply in a hurry and don't take my time to rub it in throughly. The color is great. There is an odor but it goes away after a few hours.

Best self tanning product I've ever used. Goes on evenly(with a mit! Buy one!). You can control how tan it will make you depending on how many hours you leave it on for. The color is great, I even use the residual product left on mit and apply to my face. The ONLY complaint I have is that it is sticky and you can feel it on your skin. I can't put any clothes on over top. But pros out way cons and I've repurchased multiple times. My boyfriend even uses it in the winter because it's very natural looking.

I used to by st tropez all the time but I got tired of it coming off on my sheets and rubbing off from my sports bras.. This one doesn't do that.. They've really improved their formula.. U only have to keep it on for 1-3 hours depending on how deep you want the tan so you don't have to sleep with it on .. Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS THE ONLY SELF TANNER THAT WORKS AND STAYS PUT FOR DAYS. IT IS GRADUAL LIKE IT STATES. AFTER THE 1ST HOUR YOU START TANNING IT IS AMAZING! I WILL NEVER SWITCH AND HAVE TRIED THEM ALL. CHEAP TO EXPENSIVE. THIS IS THE ONE TO GET!

The bottle says to leave on for 3 hours for maximum darkness. I left it on for 5; it still looked very natural. Don't be alarmed when the color washes off when you first shower. The tan does stay on, and you can build on top of that. Very hard for you to mess up (i.e. streaks) which is good when you are in a hurry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've sworn by the original mousse from St. Tropez for years, but have slacked on my fake-tan routine lately from being busy/lazy. I picked this up the other day when I needed an emergency tan, originally going for the One Night Only lotion (which is fantastic), but this caught my eye.  It has a tint which WILL transfer and takes a little time to dry, but it does develop faster than any other self tanner I've used and as with all St. Tropez products, the color is natural and beautiful. I didn't even have a mitt with me to use but I didn't have any problems with streakiness. I washed it off after about two hours just because of time constraint, but my tan did develop a little more after that which is awesome. Overall, love it.

i am not a fan of self tanners till i found this product. everytime i never have streaks and it looks natural! definitely buy a mitt to apply it and use sparingly on your face/feet (as usual). used it again last night before a trip out of state and have a great tan .  smells a bit when you have it drying, but i apply before bed, sleep and wash it off in the am and smell great again :)

My favorite for keeping a nice bronze year round! I don't ever feel orange and have gotten so many compliments on my color. I would DEFINITELY buy the mitt (it's not too expensive anyway). Helps the product go on smoothly and keeps your hands from staining. I've never streaked in all my times using it!  The only downfall is you have to keep it on for 3 hours before showering to see a good difference, and you feel slightly sticky, but a small price to pay when avoiding the sun and tanning beds.

Ok. So I decided to never go back in the sun. I have the ability of tanning to a medium olive naturally however without tanning I am Morticia transparent. I got a sample of this product and decided to give it a try, I went all in and did the 3 hours and I can even described how natural and sexy this tan is. I absolutely love this product!!! I follow with the st tropez bronzing lotion to touch up and I make sure to stay moisturizer throughout the day. I will definitely purchase this again. The next day there is a minor  tanning product smell but it was gone after a couple hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a HUGE fan of St. Tropez.  I love the express mousse, it's my favorite however I purchased it last night and used it, they must have changed the formula because the smell is different.  It smells like perfume, which isn't bad but it is OVERPOWERING.  I guess some people may like it, but I really am not happy with the new scent.  It is fine if I am wearing it overnight, as long as my significant other doesn't despise it, but I could never wear this during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product about a year ago, and have been afraid to try it, worried about orange, or streaky results.  WOW!  I am so happy that I finally used the St. Tropez Bronzing Mousse. It was so easy to apply, dried quickly, and smelled great!  I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: self tanning just got so much easier!
reviews.review_text: I only left it on an hour before washing off and am happy with the result. The only thing is that the tan builds over time after washing off, so immediately after washing you might not see much difference and feel like you wasted your time. It takes a few hours to get the full effect. When using the mitt it is very easy to apply and lasts a full week. This is my new go-to. I previously loved St Tropez's standard mousse but this one is so much easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have very pale skin. my normal foundation is Nars Sheer Glow in the shade Siberia. i tried this on and left it on all night and i work up with this beautiful healthy Golden glow. i've only had it on about 24 hours but so far i'm quite impressed because i look glowing and not sickly with has always been my problem. anyways if you are a pale girl i highly recommend this but i don't think 3 hrs is long enough so put it on before you go to bed and rinse off in the morning!!!

I have tried so many self tanners and this is the best by far. I have an olive skin tone that can very pale in the winter but also very very dark in the summer. I live on the coast of California and I while I generally have a decent tan all year round, in the winter I tend to not be outside quite as much and use this to give me a deeper color. I also use it the rest of the year to even out any tan lines or un-even parts of me. my legs tend to be a couple shades lighter than the rest of me and this evens everything out perfectly and there is no color difference between this and by natural tan at all. There is a slight sent to it, but its not the normal fake tan sent, and you can't smell it all once you apply the product. You do have to use the mitt that you buy separately for a good application, if you don't it will be streaky and patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this when im already tan but want to be a little bit tanner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product. It gave me more color than any other self tanner than any other and lasts longer. There is a slight smell - but significantly less than other products that I have used. Definitely buy the mit to assist in application so it goes on more evenly. That is a must.

Leaves a streak free, flawless and quick tan. I was a bridesmaid in a wedding and nothing rubbed off on my dress. It got darker as the day went on. Will be using this as long as its made. Highly recommended. It would be five stars, but the package did not say put on, wait 1 to 3 hours, then shower, only downside. After i purchased it, I peeled back the instructions and found out afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used several types of sunless tanning products. This does a beautiful job without any rubbing off due to the process. You put it on and decide if you want fair, medium or a deep tan. After 1-2 or 3 hours you shower it off and you have color. Washing it off keeps it from rubbing off on to clothing!! People have made many compliments on my tan!

I am a very fair red head so I need a lot of help in the tan department. This is the best product I have ever used. It has the least smell, the longest and most even wear, and you get a pretty dark tint with just one application. I put this on and wear it overnight. It has less transfer to sheets when just applied too than other products. I don't use the mitt, I just have a box of plastic gloves that I use and just throw them away every time.
I wish this was darker. It applies nice, but after you shower the bronzer off it doesn't look like I've tanned at all. For the money I'd get the dark full 8hour tanner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This self tanner is amazing. Not only does it develop into a naturally looking beautiful tan but you have control over how dark you want to be. Remember, it takes 8 hours to fully develop so if you don't feel like it worked directly after, give it a bit of time. My forever go to!

I am a natural redhead with freckles and always worry that self-tanner will leave me orange. This one works magic and leaves a beautiful and natural looking tan! I wouldn't say it finishes a dark tan in 3 hours, but leave it on for slightly longer and it works wonders and lasts for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I was sceptical at first because every self tanner that has claimed not to smell ended up smelling horrible! This one doesn't smell I could barely tell and it doesn't stain the sheets!!! I tried this and left it on for 3 hours and rinsed it off and got a nice colour. I didn't find it was dark enough since I have pretty light skin so I applied a second time the next day and it's perfect!! It lasts so long too!! With every other formula I tried from self tropez I had to apply every second day but now t this one!!! I would say it's gradual so apply 2 straight days for 3 hours if u prefer a darker colour like me.

reviews.review_title: Worked For Me! Couldn't Believe It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Quick Take: gradual I bought this when I saw it, came home and applied it, then while I was waiting for it to dry/work, got on Sephora's website to read some reviews. I was horrified, thinking I had once again wasted money on St Tropez (in shower lotion didn't work AT ALL). It got darker and after about 2.5 hours (just like reviewers said they did with no result!), rinsed off in the shower. Color was completely gone, so I thought for sure it was a complete waste. However, in about two hours, I noticed it was starting to darken. By bedtime, it was very dark. In the morning, super dark, but blotchy on my face. Took a shower and everything evened out. Looks fantastic! I was pleasantly surprised this is the end result after reading the reviews. I hadn't showered at all the day I put it on, I used my old mitt (had it for at least three years from St Tropez) put a pretty good slathering of lotion on my feet, ankles, knees, elbows, hands...and it turned out great. I would use this again before the mousse since this can be washed off way sooner and you don't feel as sticky for as long. Not sure if not showering was the key, but hey, it worked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This self tanner barely makes you a shade darker, even if you leave it on for 3 hours. Waste of money, do not buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My Sephora was out of the original dark mousse so i figured i'd give this a try and it was all fine like the normal formula, i knew i wouldn't achieve as dark of a tan as the dark formula but this stuff barely made me a half shade darker. It did nothing and I left it one for 4 hours. I even applied a second layer...just buy the regular formula I love it so much. I use the dark one for summer and I'm milk bottle white and it looks gorgeous.

You'll get more color using the original mousse. This is great for a light color and you don't have to sit in it all day or sleep in it. It dries quickly and is super easy to apply (make sure you buy the mit). Great for travel and quick applications that can be showered off in just a few hours. It was also kind to my super sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Holy grail but looking for something new
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been addicted to self-tanning lately (mostly because I can't spend a lot of time in the sun) and this one has been my go-to. However, it has been coming off orange lately, I'm not sure if my skin is reacting differently to it or what is going on. Remember to apply lotion as often as possible to avoid the look of cracking skin and uneven fading.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used this, I kept it on for 3 hrs. then showered. I barely had any color. Was going to return it, but decided to give it one more try. I put it on thick & left it on overnight & wow, what a difference! Got many compliments at work, & questions about which tanning bed I was using!

Pretty disappointed in this product! Application was easy and I liked that it dried so quickly but I had exfoliated as directed, then applied and waited for 2.5 hours, then showered off. I was left with NO colour, even after waiting for an additional 8 hours for it to develop. It just did absolutely nothing at all. Such a waste :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives me a tan for about a week, but the best part is the short time you leave it on for results. I react to most self tanners, but I like this short developing time for that reason. I still smell like self tanner for 2 days, but the brevity of the time you wear the mousse is a plus.

reviews.review_title: Not horrible but not the best
reviews.review_text: I typically buy the St. Tropez mousse in dark, which, as a nearly translucent Irish girl, is my self-tan holy grail, but they were out at the store I went to so in a pinch I bought this. I liked the idea of not needing to wait overnight and that feature has come in handy in the few times I've used it since I've bought it. I love not going to sleep stinking of fake tan. The color guard isn't as dark as I'm used to so application is a little trickier. I wound up with a bit more patchiness/blotchiness than I typically do and I do think it leaned a touch more orange than the dark does. It still wasn't ORANGE orange, but not the true olivey-bronze I'm used to. I liked that I could touch up the patches and missed spots in an hour though, and it all wound up blending pretty seamlessly. Overall I'll stick to the dark mousse in the future but I'm not going to return this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this! It has a nice color, nice smell, easy application, very lightweight, dried really fast. One really important thing I ignored first time I used it, use a mitt with this!!!! My hands were stained green after using it! I recommend a tanning mitt, or even just using gloves to avoid getting it on your palms! I use the Vita Liberata Tanning Mitt, it is very inexpensive, but works wonderfully!
the smell of this was disgusting. It made my hands smell like cigarettes, even after washing them multiple times. Will not purchase again.

I originally bought the express starter kit after researching for a very long time and this bronzing mousse is BY FAR the best! It is so easy to apply, the smell is pleasant, non sticky formula and leaves such a natural beautiful tan that is unbelievable! I get so many complements on my tan and even when it fades it is so natural! All around a wonderful product! I'll never use anything else!

This is the most natural looking tan I've ever gotten from a product. It is stunning and I'm very pale and do not tan easily. I'm used to mystic tan and this is on par if you're looking for a self application at home.Will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Fast Drying, good color, long lasting
reviews.review_text: This is my first St Tropez tanner and I was very surprised, but first before buying this product it was rated with over 100 reviews here in Sephora so I'm not sure why it shows less than 5 reviews now. I would definitely purchase the cheap mitt because that's what ensures a smooth application and no streaking compared to other tanners. I am very pale....like, 115 MUFE foundation is a little too dark for me.....and after the first application I had a nice glow. I waited one day and decided to add another layer without exfoliating and achieved a much better and darker color. It dries within 2 minutes to where I could put on clothes and wore it throughout the day because it didn't look bad and just had a slight smell. Once it's rinsed off it doesn't smell. I wore both applications 8 to 10 hours and slept in one application with no issues. What was so surprising was how long it lasted. I thought it had worn off until I got my legs waxed 2 weeks later and realized I had forgotten my own paleness! It faded very naturally but i am going to try the Dark Bronzing Mousse next to see if I can get a darker color in less time.

This goes on super easy and smooth. Dries quick and develops into a deep tan. Yes, you'll notice it washes off but a good amount stays behind. I've tried every self tanner out there and this is my go-to

I'm still fairly new to the self-tanning business, but I tried the original St. Tropez mousse and I loved it! It lasted for a week, but I hated having to wait so long, so I tried this product. I applied it with the mitt and I left it on for 2 1/2 hours. Before the application, I exfoliated, moisturized and all that jazz. I noticed the application wasn't as smooth as with the original formula, but I thought maybe this is how it works. After I showered, I didn't see much of a difference, but the bottle does say it continues working for 8 hours after washing it off. So my next shower, the color just came off. Not evenly either. A good amount came off my legs and my chest. I'm not sure what happened, but I will definitely stick to the original mousse.
